TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectDataSource extends System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl

summary.span: 表示向多層 Web 應用程式架構中資料繫結控制項提供資料的商務物件 (Business Object)。

span.span: Represents a business object that provides data to data-bound controls in multitier Web application architectures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [用途Purpose](#purpose) - [擷取資料Retrieving Data](#retrieving_data) - [執行資料作業Performing Data Operations](#performing_data_operations) - [篩選資料Filtering Data](#filtering_data) - [快取Caching](#caching) - [功能Features](#features) - [資料檢視Data View](#data_view) - [使用 LINQ to SQLUsing LINQ to SQL](#using_linq_to_sql) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項適用於您所建立的類別。An control works with a class that you create. 建立方法，擷取並更新資料，而且您提供的這些方法的名稱標記中的控制項。You create methods that retrieve and update data, and you provide the names of those methods to the control in markup. 轉譯或回傳的處理期間呼叫您所指定的方法。During rendering or postback processing, the calls the methods that you have specified. 沒有任何視覺化的呈現的控制項。There is no visual rendering of the control. 如此一來，這類不支援視覺化功能或屬性。As a result, the does not support visual features such as the or property. ## 用途Purpose 將展示層與商務邏輯和商務物件中的商務邏輯封裝很常見的應用程式設計作法。A very common application design practice is to separate the presentation layer from business logic and to encapsulate the business logic in business objects. 這些商務物件會形成展示層和資料層，導致三層式應用程式架構之間的不同圖層。These business objects form a distinct layer between the presentation layer and the data tier, resulting in a three-tier application architecture. 控制項可讓開發人員使用 ASP.NET 資料來源控制項，同時保留其三層式應用程式架構。The control enables developers to use an ASP.NET data source control while retaining their three-tier application architecture. 控制項使用反映來建立商務物件的執行個體，並呼叫方法以擷取、 更新、 插入和刪除資料。The control uses reflection to create instances of business objects and to call methods on them to retrieve, update, insert, and delete data. 屬性會識別類別的名稱，搭配。The property identifies the name of the class that the works with. 會建立並終結的每個方法呼叫的類別執行個體，其並未持有的物件在記憶體中的 Web 要求的存留期。The control creates and destroys an instance of the class for each method call; it does not hold the object in memory for the lifetime of the Web request. 如果您使用的商務物件所需的許多資源，或因建立和終結耗費資源，這會是一個重要的考量。This is a serious consideration if the business object that you use requires many resources or is otherwise expensive to create and destroy. 使用高度耗費資源的物件可能不會是最佳設計選擇，但是您可以使用來控制物件的生命週期， ，和事件。Using an expensive object might not be an optimal design choice, but you can control the life cycle of the object by using the , , and events. > [!NOTE] > 所識別的方法， ， ，以及屬性可以是執行個體方法或`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中) 的方法。The methods that are identified by the , , , and properties can be instance methods or `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) methods. 如果方法是`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中)，無法建立商務物件的執行個體，而， ，和則不會引發事件。If the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), an instance of the business object is not created, and the , , and events are not raised. ## 擷取資料Retrieving Data 若要擷取商務物件中的資料，設定屬性來擷取資料之方法的名稱。To retrieve data from a business object, set the property to the name of the method that retrieves data. 如果此方法不會傳回或是物件，該物件會包裝在執行階段集合。If the method does not return an or object, the object is wrapped by the runtime in an collection. 如果方法簽章會有參數，您可以加入物件至集合，然後將它們繫結至您想要傳遞至方法所指定的值屬性。If the method signature has parameters, you can add objects to the collection, and then bind them to the values that you want to pass to the method that is specified by the property. 為了讓控制項使用的參數，參數必須符合的名稱和方法簽章中參數的型別。In order for the control to use the parameters, the parameters must match the names and types of the parameters in the method signature. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，與 ObjectDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information, see [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). 控制項擷取資料時呼叫方法。The control retrieves data whenever the method is called. 這個方法會提供以程式設計方式存取所指定的方法屬性。This method provides programmatic access to the method that is specified by property. 所指定的方法屬性會自動呼叫繫結至控制項當他們`DataBind`呼叫方法。The method that is specified by the property is called automatically by controls that are bound to the when their `DataBind` method is called. 如果您將設定`DataSourceID`資料繫結控制項的屬性，控制自動繫結至資料來源的資料，視。If you set the `DataSourceID` property of a data-bound control, the control automatically binds to data from the data source, as needed. 設定`DataSourceID`屬性是繫結的建議的方法資料繫結控制項的控制項。Setting the `DataSourceID` property is the recommended method for binding an control to a data-bound control. 或者，您可以設定`DataSource`屬性，但接著您必須明確地呼叫`DataBind`資料繫結控制項的方法。Alternatively, you can set the `DataSource` property, but then you must explicitly call the `DataBind` method of the data-bound control. 您可以呼叫以程式設計方式在任何時間，來擷取資料的方法。You can call the method programmatically at any time to retrieve data. 如需有關將資料繫結控制項繫結至資料來源控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 繫結至資料使用資料來源控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e41adfff-8fb8-449e-9cd1-9bd49788c5f7)。For more information about binding data-bound controls to data source controls, see [Binding to Data Using a Data Source Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e41adfff-8fb8-449e-9cd1-9bd49788c5f7). ## 執行資料作業Performing Data Operations 根據商務物件控制項使用，您可以執行資料作業，例如更新、 插入和刪除。Depending on the capabilities of the business object that the control works with, you can perform data operations, such as updates, insertions, and deletions. 若要執行這些資料作業，請設定適當的方法名稱和任何相關聯的參數，您想要執行的作業。To perform these data operations, set the appropriate method name and any associated parameters for the operation that you want to perform. 例如，更新作業，設定屬性設為名稱之商務物件方法執行更新，並新增任何必要的參數來集合。For example, for an update operation, set the property to the name of the business object method that performs updates and add any required parameters to the collection. 如果與資料繫結控制項關聯的控制項，則參數會加入資料繫結控制項。If the control is associated with a data-bound control, the parameters are added by the data-bound control. 在此情況下，您需要確定方法的參數名稱相符的資料繫結控制項中的欄位名稱。In this case, you need to ensure that the parameter names of the method match the field names in the data-bound control. 在執行更新時呼叫方法時，可以明確地您的程式碼也會自動由資料繫結控制項。The update is performed when the method is called, either explicitly by your code or automatically by a data-bound control. 遵循相同的一般模式和作業。The same general pattern is followed for and operations. 商務物件會假設為會執行這些類型的資料作業的一筆記錄一次，而不是批次。Business objects are assumed to perform these types of data operations one record at a time, rather than batched. ## 篩選資料Filtering Data 控制項可以篩選所擷取的資料屬性，如果資料以傳回或物件。The control can filter data that is retrieved by the property, if the data is returned as a or object. 您可以設定屬性設定為篩選條件運算式使用的格式字串的語法，並將值繫結至參數中指定的運算式中集合。You can set the property to a filtering expression by using a format string syntax and bind values in the expression to parameters that are specified in the collection. ## 快取Caching 雖然不會保留執行個體的多個要求之間的商務物件，它可以快取的呼叫所識別的方法結果屬性。Although the does not retain the instance of the business object across multiple requests, it can cache the result of calling the method identified by the property. 當資料快取，後續呼叫方法會傳回快取的資料，而不要建立商務物件，然後呼叫其使用反映。While the data is cached, subsequent calls to the method return the cached data instead of creating the business object and calling its using reflection. 快取可讓您避免建立物件並呼叫其資料方法，但會犧牲記憶體在 Web 伺服器上。Caching lets you avoid creating the object and calling its data method at the expense of memory on the Web server. 自動快取資料時屬性設定為`true`，和屬性設定為快取會將資料儲存在捨棄快取之前的秒數。The automatically caches data when the property is set to `true`, and the property is set to the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache is discarded. 您也可以指定屬性，以及一個選擇性屬性。You can also specify a property and an optional property. 控制項可讓您快取所有類型的資料，但您不應快都取保留資源或無法共用來服務多個要求的狀態的物件 (例如，開啟物件)，因為相同的執行個體的物件將會用來服務多個要求。The control allows you to cache all types of data, but you should not cache objects that retain resources or state that cannot be shared to service multiple requests (for example, an open object), because the same instance of the object will be used to service multiple requests. ## 功能Features 下表描述的功能控制項。The following table describes the features of the control. |功能Capability|需求Requirements| |----------------|------------------| |選取Selecting|設定公司名稱的屬性物件選取資料的方法，並包含任何必要的參數，在集合以程式設計方式或使用資料繫結控制項。Set the property to the name of the business object method that selects data, and include any necessary parameters in the collection either programmatically or by using a data-bound control.| |排序Sorting|設定屬性中的參數名稱帶有排序條件的方法。Set the property to the name of the parameter in the method that carries the sort criteria.| |篩選Filtering|設定屬性的篩選條件運算式與選擇性地加入任何參數，以便來篩選資料的集合時呼叫方法。Set the property to a filtering expression and optionally add any parameters to the collection to filter the data when the method is called. 所指定的方法屬性必須傳回或。The method specified by the property must return a or .| |分頁Paging|資料來源分頁支援，則如果方法包含要擷取的記錄數目上限和要擷取的第一個資料錄的索引參數。Data source paging is supported, if the method contains parameters for the maximum number of records to retrieve and the index of the first record to retrieve. 必須在中設定這些參數的名稱和屬性，分別。The names of those parameters must be set in the and properties, respectively. 資料繫結控制項時可能會無法執行分頁本身，即使控制項不支援直接在所指定的方法中的分頁屬性。A data-bound control might be able to perform paging itself, even if the control does not support paging directly in the method specified by the property. 若要能夠執行這項操作的資料繫結控制項的需求是藉由指定的方法屬性傳回該物件會實作介面。The requirement for the data-bound control to be able to do this is that the method specified by the property return an object that implements the interface.| |UpdatingUpdating|設定公司名稱的屬性物件方法會更新資料，並包含任何必要的參數，在集合。Set the property to the name of the business object method that updates data, and include any necessary parameters in the collection.| |DeletingDeleting|設定公司名稱的屬性物件方法或函式會刪除資料，並包含任何必要的參數，在集合。Set the property to the name of the business object method or function that deletes data, and include any necessary parameters in the collection.| |插入Inserting|設定公司名稱的屬性物件方法或函式所插入的資料，並包含任何必要的參數，在集合。Set the property to the name of the business object method or function that inserts data, and include any necessary parameters in the collection.| |快取Caching|設定屬性，以`true`，而和根據您想要針對您快取資料的快取行為的屬性。Set the property to `true`, and the and properties according to the caching behavior you want for your cached data.| > [!NOTE] > 當您使用類別來更新或插入資料，在用戶端輸入的字串不會自動轉換從用戶端文化特性的格式為 server 文化特性格式。When you use the class to update or insert data, strings that are entered at the client are not automatically converted from the client culture format to the server culture format. 例如，用戶端文化特性可能會做為日期格式，指定 DD/MM/YYYY，而且在伺服器上的日期格式可能 MM/DD/YYYY。For example, the client culture might specify DD/MM/YYYY as the date format, and the date format on the server might be MM/DD/YYYY. 在此情況下，會在輸入 2009 年 10 月 5 日控制為 2009 年 5 月 10 日，但會被解譯為 2009 年 5 月 10 日。In that case, October 5, 2009 would be entered in a control as 5/10/2009 but would be interpreted as May 10, 2009. 2009 年 10 月 15 日會輸入為 15/10/2009年，並會遭到拒絕為無效的日期。October 15, 2009 would be entered as 15/10/2009, and would be rejected as an invalid date. ## 資料檢視Data View 如同所有的資料來源控制項，控制項是在資料來源檢視類別與相關聯。As with all data source controls, the control is associated with a data source view class. 雖然控制項是網頁開發人員用來處理資料，介面類別是資料繫結控制項使用的介面。While the control is the interface that the page developer uses to work with data, the class is the interface that data-bound controls work with. 此外，類別說明資料來源控制項的功能，並會執行實際工作。Additionally, the class describes the capabilities of the data source control, and performs the actual work. 控制項，則只有一個相關聯，且一律命名為`DefaultView`。The control has only one associated , and it is always named `DefaultView`. 雖然物件由方法，許多屬性和方法會包裝，而且直接由公開控制項。While the object is exposed by the method, many of its properties and methods are wrapped and exposed directly by the control. 在幕後物件執行所有的資料作業，包括擷取、 插入、 更新、 刪除、 篩選和排序資料。Behind the scenes, the object performs all data operations, including retrieving, inserting, updating, deleting, filtering, and sorting the data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## 使用 LINQ to SQLUsing LINQ to SQL 您可以使用與 LINQ to SQL 類別的控制項。You can use the control with a LINQ to SQL class. 若要這樣做，您將屬性設為資料內容類別的名稱。To do so, you set the property to the name of the data-context class. 您也設定， ， ，和方法來執行對應作業中的資料內容類別的方法。You also set the , , , and methods to the methods in the data-context class that perform the corresponding operations. 您必須建立的事件處理常式才能取消處置資料內容類別的事件。You must create an event handler for the event in order to cancel disposing of the data-context class. 這是必要步驟，因為 LINQ to SQL 支援延後的執行，而控制項嘗試在選取作業之後處置資料內容。This step is necessary because LINQ to SQL supports deferred execution, whereas the control tries to dispose the data context after the Select operation. 如需如何建立 LINQ to SQL 類別的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 建立的 LINQ to SQL 類別，在 Web 專案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information about how to create LINQ to SQL classes, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). 如需如何取消處置資料內容類別的範例，請參閱事件。For an example of how to cancel the disposing of a data context class, see the event. ## 使用 Entity FrameworkUsing the Entity Framework 您也可以使用與 Entity Framework 的控制項。You can also use the control with the Entity Framework. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 Entity Framework 和 ObjectDataSource 控制項](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=209117)。For more information, see [Using the Entity Framework and the ObjectDataSource Control](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=209117). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web site 專案位於：[下載](http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Project/Download/FileDownload.aspx?ProjectName=aspnetmsdnexamples&DownloadId=14838)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Project/Download/FileDownload.aspx?ProjectName=aspnetmsdnexamples&DownloadId=14838). 此區段會顯示在.aspx 標記中，頁面上，它指出它所使用的商務物件。This section shows an in markup in an .aspx page and it shows the business objects that it works with. 此範例是.aspx 頁面。The example is the .aspx page. 它包含繫結至控制項控制項。It contains a control that is bound to an control. 控制項標記指定的商務物件的名稱和商務物件方法呼叫，以擷取資料的名稱。The control markup specifies the name of the business object and the name of the business object method to call in order to retrieve data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/CS/objds1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/VB/objds1vb.aspx#1)] 下列範例顯示商務物件.aspx 頁面中的控制項使用。The following example shows the business object that the control in the .aspx page uses. (許多其他程式碼範例也使用此商務物件。)此範例包含下列兩個基本類別：(Many other code examples use this business object also.) The example consists of the following two basic classes: - `EmployeeLogic`類別是商務邏輯類別使用。The `EmployeeLogic` class is the business logic class that the uses. - `NorthwindEmployee`類別會定義所傳回的資料物件`GetAllEmployees`方法`EmployeeLogic`類別。The `NorthwindEmployee` class defines the data object that is returned by the `GetAllEmployees` method of the `EmployeeLogic` class. 額外`NorthwindDataException`類別為了方便起見提供。An additional `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience. 這組範例類別搭配適用於 Microsoft SQL Server 和 Microsoft Access Northwind Traders 資料庫中。This set of example classes works with the Northwind Traders database, which is available with Microsoft SQL Server and Microsoft Access. 如需完整的實用範例，您必須編譯，並使用這些類別所提供的.aspx 頁面範例。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes with the .aspx page example that is provided. 如需有關如何安裝 Northwind Traders 資料庫的資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 安裝範例資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed1291f6-604c-4972-ae22-0345c6dea12e)。For information about how to install the Northwind Traders database, see [How to: Install Sample Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed1291f6-604c-4972-ae22-0345c6dea12e). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/CS/northwindemployee1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/VB/northwindemployee1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`typeName`參數可以是位於 Bin 或 App_Code 目錄中的程式碼的不完整的類型 」 或 「 已註冊在全域組件快取中的程式碼的完整型別名稱。The value of the `typeName` parameter can be a partially qualified type for code that is located in the Bin or App_Code directory or a fully qualified type name for code that is registered in the global assembly cache. 如果您使用全域組件快取時，您必須新增到適當的參考`assemblies`Machine.config 或 Web.config 組態檔區段。If you use the global assembly cache, you must add the appropriate reference to the `assemblies` section of the Machine.config or Web.config configuration file.

summary.span: 取得或設定資料來源控制項快取 屬性擷取之資料的時間長度 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time, in seconds, that the data source control caches data that is retrieved by the property.

value.span: 快取 屬性引動之結果的秒數。

span.span: The number of seconds that the caches the results of a property invocation.

value.span: 預設值為 0。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援的資料快取。The control supports data caching. 雖然快取資料，呼叫方法擷取資料，從快取，而不是從商務物件搭配。While data is cached, calls to the method retrieve data from the cache rather than from the business object that the works with. 當快取過期時，方法擷取商務物件中的資料，並再次快取資料。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the business object, and then caches the data again. 控制項自動快取資料時屬性設定為`true`而屬性設為大於 0，表示快取會儲存資料的快取項目之前的秒數會被捨棄。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 值為 0 表示無限長的快取。A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache. 快取持續時間的組合所受管制而設定。The cache is regulated by a combination of the duration and the setting. 如果屬性設定為的值，快取資料的第一個呼叫方法並保留它在記憶體中，最多的時間所指定的量屬性。If the property is set to the value, the caches data on the first call to the method and holds it in memory for, at most, the amount of time that is specified by the property. 如果需要記憶體時，資料可能會釋放之前持續時間。The data might be released before the duration time, if the memory is needed. 然後會在下一個呼叫期間會重新整理快取方法。The cache is then refreshed during the next call to the method. 如果屬性設定為的值，資料來源控制項快取資料的第一個呼叫方法，但會重設的時間範圍，當中每個後續呼叫上的快取方法。If the property is set to value, the data source control caches data on the first call to the method, but resets the time window for which it holds the cache on each subsequent call to the method. 快取到期時間，等於沒有活動是否屬性，因為在上次呼叫方法。The cache expires if there is no activity for a time that is equal to the property since the last call to the method. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何物件支援快取。The first code example demonstrates how an object supports caching. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何實作包裝函式方法會傳回物件來啟用快取物件。The second code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a object to enable caching with an object. 下列程式碼範例示範如何控制項支援快取。The following code example demonstrates how an control supports caching. 若要啟用快取，您必須實作的方法，擷取資料，以識別屬性，來傳回資料當做物件。To enable caching, you must implement the method that retrieves data, which is identified by the property, to return the data as a object. 在此範例中，屬性設定為`true`，而和設定屬性。In this example, the property is set to `true`, and the and properties are set. 所傳回的資料會快取30 秒的屬性。The caches data that is returned by the property for 30 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6/CS/objds6cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6/VB/objds6vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作包裝函式方法會傳回物件來啟用快取控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a object to enable caching with an control. 中的基底實作`EmployeeLogic`類別，`GetAllEmployees`方法會傳回物件。In the base implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` class, the `GetAllEmployees` method returns an object. 而不是重構完全要使用的物件名在 Web Form 頁面上，為包裝函式方法`GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet`加入傳回一組`NorthwindEmployee`做為資料。Instead of refactoring the object completely to work with the on a Web Forms page, a wrapper method named `GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet` is added that returns a set of `NorthwindEmployee` data as a . 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援的資料快取。The control supports data caching. 雖然快取資料，呼叫方法擷取資料，從快取，而不是從商務物件搭配。While data is cached, calls to the method retrieve data from the cache rather than from the business object that the works with. 當快取過期時，方法擷取商務物件中的資料，並再次快取資料。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the business object, and then caches the data again. 控制項自動快取資料時屬性設定為`true`而屬性設為大於 0，表示快取會儲存資料的快取項目之前的秒數會被捨棄。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 值為 0 表示無限長的快取期間。A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache period. 快取持續時間的組合所受管制而設定。The cache is regulated by a combination of the duration and the setting. 如果屬性設定為的值，快取資料的第一個呼叫方法並保留它在記憶體中，最多的時間所指定的量屬性。If the property is set to the value, the caches data on the first call to the method and holds it in memory for, at most, the amount of time that is specified by the property. 如果需要記憶體時，資料可能會釋放之前持續時間。The data might be released before the duration time, if the memory is needed. 然後會在下一個呼叫期間會重新整理快取方法。The cache is then refreshed during the next call to the method. 如果屬性設定為的值，資料來源控制項快取資料的第一個呼叫方法，但會重設的時間範圍，它會保留快取中的每個後續呼叫方法。If the property is set to the value, the data source control caches data on the first call to the method, but resets the time window for which it holds the cache for each subsequent call to the method. 快取到期時間，等於沒有活動是否屬性，因為在上次呼叫方法。The cache expires if there is no activity for a time that is equal to the property since the last call to the method. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何物件支援篩選和快取。The first code example demonstrates how an object supports filtering and caching. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何實作包裝函式方法會傳回物件來啟用快取和使用篩選物件。The second code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a object to enable caching and filtering with an object. 下列程式碼範例示範如何控制項支援篩選和快取。The following code example demonstrates how an control supports filtering and caching. 若要啟用篩選和快取，您必須實作的方法，擷取資料，以識別屬性，來傳回資料當做物件。To enable filtering and caching, you must implement the method that retrieves data, which is identified by the property, to return the data as a object. 在此範例中，快取已啟用，因為`EmployeeLogic`物件傳回資料做為，則屬性設定為`true`，而和屬性會設定。In this example, caching is enabled because the `EmployeeLogic` object returns data as a , the property is set to `true`, and the and properties are set. 所傳回的資料會快取30 秒的屬性。The caches data that is returned by the property for 30 seconds. summary.span: 取得或設定使用者定義的索引鍵相依性，連結至資料來源控制項所建立的所有資料快取物件。

span.span: Gets or sets a user-defined key dependency that is linked to all data cache objects that are created by the data source control.

value.span: 索引鍵，識別 建立的所有快取物件。

span.span: A key that identifies all cache objects created by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以設定為任何任意字串值。The property can be set to any arbitrary string value. 當索引鍵過期時，所有快取的物件也會明確過期。All cache objects are explicitly expired when the key is expired. 這可讓您要使其失效的快取項目所建立的從自己的網頁程式碼以程式設計的方式。This allows you to invalidate cache entries that are created by the from your own page code programmatically. 控制項支援的資料快取。The control supports data caching. 雖然快取資料，呼叫方法擷取資料，從快取，而不是從商務物件搭配。While data is cached, calls to the method retrieve data from the cache rather than from the business object that the works with. 當快取過期時，方法擷取商務物件中的資料，並再次快取資料。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the business object, and then caches the data again. 控制項自動快取資料時屬性設定為`true`而屬性設為大於 0，表示快取會儲存資料的快取項目之前的秒數會被捨棄。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 值為 0 表示無限長的快取。A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache. 您可以設定屬性，以建立所建立的所有快取項目之間的相依性控制項和索引鍵。You can set the property to create a dependency between all cache entries that are created by the control and the key. 您可以終止所有的快取項目以程式設計方式在任何時間索引鍵過期。You can expire all the cache entries programmatically at any time by expiring the key. 使用過期的索引鍵與目前的方法做為參數的值。Expire the key by using the method with the current value as the parameter. 唯一快取項目建立的每個組合， ， ， ，和屬性。A unique cache entry is created for every combination of the , , , , and properties. 多個控制項可以使用相同的快取項目在案例中，它們將資料載入使用相同的型別、 方法及參數。Multiple controls can use the same cache entries in scenarios where they load data using the same type, method, and parameters. ## Examples 下列三個範例顯示網頁，程式碼後置頁面類別，並從 Northwind 資料庫中的 [員工] 資料表中擷取記錄的資料存取類別。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that retrieve records from the Employees table in the Northwind database. 第一個範例顯示包含兩個網頁控制項控制項，和控制項。The first example shows a Web page that contains two controls, a control, and a control. 第一個控制項和控制項用以擷取並顯示資料庫中的員工名稱。The first control and the control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database. 第二個控制項和控制項用以擷取並顯示所選取使用者的員工記錄。The second control and the control are used to retrieve and display the employee record that is selected by the user. 啟用快取控制項。Caching is enabled for the control. 因此，每一筆記錄會擷取從資料庫一次。Therefore, each record is retrieved only one time from the database. 屬性設定為"EmployeeDetails"，但任何字串值可做為索引鍵。The property is set to "EmployeeDetails", but any string value can work as the key. 網頁也包括使用者可以按一下到期的快取的資料的控制項。The Web page also includes a control that the user can click to expire the cached data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default2.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default2.aspx#3)] 第二個範例顯示的處理常式事件和處理常式事件的控制項。The second example shows a handler for the event and a handler for the event of the control. 事件處理常式設定為以索引鍵建立的快取項目值。The event handler creates a cache item with a key set to the value. 事件處理常式中移除快取項目索引鍵是否等於值。The event handler removes the cache item whose key is equal to the value. 移除快取項目時，則所有相依於索引鍵的快取的資料已過期。When the cache item is removed, all the cached data that is dependent on the key is expired. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default2.aspx.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default2.aspx.vb#4)] 第三個範例會顯示與 Northwind 資料庫互動的資料存取類別。The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database. 類別會使用 LINQ 來查詢 [員工] 資料表。The class uses LINQ to query the Employees table. 這個範例需要 LINQ to SQL 類別代表 Northwind 資料庫的 Employees 資料表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and the Employees table. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建立的 LINQ to SQL 類別，在 Web 專案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.vb#5)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，判斷是只有新值傳遞至 方法，還是舊值和新值都傳遞至 方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether or not just the new values are passed to the method or both the old and new values are passed to the method.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定是否要將舊的和新值的參數套用至所指定的方法屬性。This property determines whether parameters for old and new values are applied to the method specified by the property. 比方說，如果方法是所指定屬性會傳回控制項的資料行`Name`並`Number`，和屬性設定為 欄位中，針對建立參數`Name`並`Number`如`Update`方法。For example, if the method that is specified by the property returns a control with the columns `Name` and `Number`, and the property is set to the field, parameters are created for `Name` and `Number` for the `Update` method. 如果屬性設定為的值，參數會針對`Name`， `Number`， `original_Name`，和`original_Number`。If the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name`, `Number`, `original_Name`, and `original_Number`. (原始值的確切名稱的參數取決於屬性。)接著會判斷方法是否在指定屬性具有相符的參數。(The exact name of the parameters for the original values depends on the property.) The then determines whether the method that is specified in the property has parameters that match. 並行存取控制是一種技術，來控制如何讀取及多個用戶端存取和管理相同的資料時，存放區中變更資料的資料存放區使用。Concurrency control is a technique that data stores use to control how data is read and changed in the store when multiple clients are accessing and manipulating the same data. 例如，一個用戶端讀取資料，並提供給使用者，而另一個用戶端讀取相同的資料，並提供給不同的使用者。For example, one client reads data and presents it to a user, while another client reads the same data and presents it to a different user. 如果兩個使用者更新的資料，並將它提交至資料存放區，可能會發生非預期的結果，因為這兩個用戶端可能會提供不同的值為相同的資料。If both users update the data and submit it to the data storage, an unexpected result might occur, because both clients might provide different values for the same data. 這會視為衝突。This is considered a conflict. 藉由設定屬性，以的值，`Update`方法可以再比較以原始的資料來源，以便偵測衝突，並視需要處理它們的最大值舊和新值。By setting the property to the value, the `Update` method can then compare the old and new values to the original data source to detect conflicts and handle them as necessary. 屬性會將委派給屬性相關聯的物件控制項。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control.

summary.span: 取得或設定類別的名稱， 控制項會將該類別用於更新、插入或刪除資料作業中的參數，而不會從資料繫結控制項傳遞個別的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a class that the control uses for a parameter in an update, insert, or delete data operation, instead of passing individual values from the data-bound control.

value.span: 部分或完整類別名稱，識別 可做為參數用於 、 或 作業的物件型別。

span.span: A partially or fully qualified class name that identifies the type of the object that the can use as a parameter for an , , or a operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是指定數個參數傳遞給， ，和方法，您可以建立數個資料欄位值彙總的一個物件。Instead of specifying several parameters that are passed to the , , and methods, you can create one object that aggregates several data field values. 這一個物件會傳遞至方法，而不是數個參數。This one object is passed to the methods, instead of several parameters. 預設行為繫結至資料繫結控制項的控制項時，會建立資料繫結控制項資料來源中每個參數的物件。The default behavior of an control that is bound to a data-bound control is that the data-bound control creates a object for each parameter in the data source. 如果商務物件有許多欄位，則產生的方法也會有許多欄位。If the business object has many fields, the resulting method also has many fields. 屬性可讓您指定具有每個資料欄位的屬性型別。The property allows you to specify a type that has a property for each data field. 然後，而不是傳遞給方法的數個參數，執行階段會建立一個物件，並設定其所有屬性。Then, instead of passing several parameters to the method, the runtime creates one object and sets all of its properties. 這一個物件加入至方法呼叫的參數集合。This one object is added to the parameters collection for the method call. 所指定的型別屬性必須有預設建構函式沒有參數，因此控制項可以建立型別的執行個體。The type that is specified by the property must have a default constructor that has no parameters, so the control can create an instance of the type. 類型也必須有可設定的屬性，可讓控制項將填入該物件會從資料繫結控制項傳遞的值。The type must also have settable properties that allow the control to populate the object with values that are passed from the data-bound control. 上的屬性名稱控制項應該完全符合值的資料繫結控制項所傳遞的參數名稱。The property names on the control are expected to exactly match the parameter names of values that are passed by the data-bound control. 當屬性設定而控制項是與資料繫結控制項，所指定的方法相關聯和屬性都必須具有中指定之型別的一個參數屬性。When the property is set and the control is associated with a data-bound control, the methods that are specified by the and properties must each have one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 如果屬性設定為值，指定方法屬性必須有一個參數中指定之型別的屬性。If the property is set to the value, the method that is specified by the property must have one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 如果屬性設定為值，指定方法屬性必須有兩個參數中指定之型別的屬性。If the property is set to the value, the method that is specified by the property must have two parameters of the type that is specified in the property. 第一個參數會包含原始的值;第二個參數會包含新的值。The first parameter contains the original values; the second parameter contains the new values. 屬性會將委派給屬性相關聯控制項。The property delegates to the property of the that is associated with the control. ## Examples 本章節包含兩個程式碼範例。The section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何實作的型別，將所有的參數值合併成一個物件，使用屬性。The first code example demonstrates how to implement a type that combines all parameter values into one object, using the property. 第二個程式碼範例顯示使用兩個類別中的第一個程式碼範例所使用的網頁。The second code example shows the Web page that uses the two classes that are used in the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作的型別，將所有的參數值合併成一個物件，使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a type that combines all parameter values into one object, using the property. Select 方法的`AggregateData`類別會傳回具有兩個資料行命名為物件`Name`和`Number`。The select method of the `AggregateData` class returns a object with two columns named `Name` and `Number`. 同樣地，`NewData`類別會定義兩個讀取/寫入屬性`Name`和`Number`。Similarly, the `NewData` class defines two read/write properties, `Name` and `Number`. `Insert`方法`AggregateData`類別會採用一個參數的型別`NewData`。The `Insert` method of the `AggregateData` class takes one parameter of type `NewData`. `TypeName`的屬性設為`AggregateData`並屬性設定為`NewData`。The `TypeName` property of the is set to `AggregateData` and the property is set to `NewData`. [!code-csharp[ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName/CS/AggregateData.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName/VB/AggregateData.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例顯示使用兩個類別中先前的程式碼範例所使用的網頁。The following code example shows the Web page that uses the two classes that are used in the preceding code example. [!code-aspx-csharp[ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName/CS/AggregateDataPageCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName/VB/AggregateDataPageVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 藉由呼叫由 屬性所識別的方法，同時使用 集合中的任何參數，執行刪除作業。

span.span: Performs a delete operation by calling the method that is identified by the property with any parameters that are in the collection.

returns.span: 如果在 事件中設定了 的 屬性，則為表示從基礎資料存放區刪除之資料列數目的值，否則為 -1。

span.span: A value that represents the number of rows deleted from the underlying data storage, if the property of the is set in the event; otherwise, -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 再執行作業時，方法呼叫來引發事件。Before the operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理事件來檢查參數的值，以及任何先執行前置處理作業。You can handle the event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a operation. 若要執行刪除作業，物件會使用反映來建立物件所識別的執行個體屬性。To perform a delete operation, the object uses reflection to create an instance of the object that is identified by the property. 接著，它呼叫的方法，由會使用所有相關聯的屬性屬性。It then calls the method that is identified by the property, using any associated properties. 如果刪除參數來自相關聯的資料繫結控制項時，根據建立參數的名稱屬性。If the deletion parameters come from an associated data-bound control, the name of the parameters is created according to the property. 在後作業完成時，方法呼叫來引發事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理來檢查任何傳回值、 輸出參數，以及例外狀況，並執行任何後續處理的事件。You can handle the event to examine any return values, output parameters, and exceptions, and to perform any post-processing. 方法會委派給方法相關聯的物件控制項。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. ## 資料繫結控制項Data-Bound Controls 當控制項控制項相關聯資料繫結，例如控制項，不需要呼叫從網頁程式碼的方法。When the control is associated with a data-bound control, such as the control, it is not necessary to call the method from page code. 方法是直接由叫用資料繫結控制項改。The method is invoked directly by the data-bound control instead. 如需有關參數合併、 物件存留期，以及方法解析的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Deleted As ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 作業已經完成時。

span.span: Occurs when a operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件，來檢查傳回的值或輸出參數的值，或判斷是否發生例外狀況在之後作業已完成。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value or output parameters, or to determine whether an exception was thrown after a operation has completed. 傳回值、 輸出參數和例外狀況處理屬性都是從與事件相關聯的物件。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 您可以使用的屬性物件，傳回從已刪除的資料列數方法。You can use the property of the object to return the number of rows that were deleted from the method. 若要這樣做，請設定屬性。To do this, set the property. 如果您從所指定的方法傳回的已刪除的資料列數目屬性的值是可從屬性物件。If you return the number of deleted rows from the method that is specified by the property, the value is available from the property of the object. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的物件和控制項刪除資料。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to delete data. 第二個程式碼範例示範`EmployeeLogic`第一個程式碼範例中使用的類別。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項使用商務物件和控制項刪除資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 一開始，控制項會顯示所有員工，使用的方法，由一組屬性以從中擷取資料`EmployeeLogic`物件。Initially, the control displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因為屬性設定為`true`，則控制項自動顯示**刪除** 按鈕。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果您按一下**刪除** 按鈕，刪除作業會執行使用的方法，由屬性和任何參數中指定集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the delete operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此範例中，也會執行一些前置處理和後置處理步驟。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`委派呼叫以處理事件會在執行此作業之前，`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委派呼叫以處理後作業完成執行例外狀況處理的事件。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed to perform exception handling. 在此範例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`會擲回，它由`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`方法。In this code example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範`EmployeeLogic`上述的程式碼範例中使用的類別。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/northwindemployee10.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/northwindemployee10.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項叫用以刪除資料之方法或函式的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the control invokes to delete data.

value.span: 字串，表示 用於刪除資料之方法或函式的名稱。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the uses to delete data.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 商務物件會假設為一次，而不是批次中，刪除資料的一筆記錄。The business object is assumed to delete data one record at a time, rather than in a batch. 屬性會將委派給屬性相關聯的物件控制項。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. 請確定參數名稱設定為控制在集合符合 select 方法所傳回的資料行名稱。Make sure that the parameter names configured for the control in the collection match the column names that are returned by the select method. ## 物件存留期Object Lifetime 所識別的方法屬性可以是執行個體方法或`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中) 方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果是執行個體方法，建立及終結每次商務物件稱為屬性。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the property is called. 您可以處理並事件，以使用之前的商務物件屬性稱為。You can handle the and events to work with the business object before the property is called. 您也可以處理之後都將引發的事件稱為屬性。You can also handle the event that is raised after the property is called. 如果商務物件會實作介面，方法會終結物件之前呼叫。If the business object implements the interface, the method is called before the object is destroyed. 如果方法`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中) 方法，不會建立商務物件，而且您無法處理， ，和事件。If the method is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the business object is never created and you cannot handle the , , and events. ## 合併的參數Parameter Merging 參數會加入至三個來源的集合：Parameters are added to the collection from three sources: - 從資料繫結控制項，在執行階段。From the data-bound control, at run time. - 從`DeleteParameters`項目，以宣告方式。From the `DeleteParameters` element, declaratively. - 從`Deleting`方法，以宣告方式。From the `Deleting` method, declaratively. 首先，將資料繫結控制項所產生的任何參數新增至集合。First, any parameters that are generated from data-bound controls are added to the collection. 比方說，如果控制項所繫結具有資料行的控制項`Name`並`Number`，參數`Name`和`Number`加入至集合。For example, if the control is bound to a control that has the columns `Name` and `Number`, parameters for `Name` and `Number` are added to the collection. 參數的完整名稱取決於屬性。The exact name of the parameter depends on the property. 這些參數的資料類型是`string`。The data type of these parameters is `string`. 下一步，參數中所列`DeleteParameters`新增項目。Next, the parameters that are listed in the `DeleteParameters` element are added. 如果中的參數`DeleteParameters`在找到具有相同名稱做為已在為參數的項目集合中，現有的參數會修改成符合參數中指定`DeleteParameters`項目。If a parameter in the `DeleteParameters` element is found with the same name as a parameter that is already in the collection, the existing parameter is modified to match the parameter that is specified in the `DeleteParameters` element. 一般而言，這用來修改參數中的資料型別。Typically, this is used to modify the type of the data in the parameter. 最後，您可以透過程式設計方式加入和移除參數之前，就會發生的事件方法執行。Finally, you can programmatically add and remove parameters in the event, which occurs before the method is run. 參數會合併之後，就會解決方法。The method is resolved after the parameters are merged. 方法解析會在下一節中討論。Method resolution is discussed in the next section. ## 方法解析Method Resolution 當呼叫方法時，資料欄位從資料繫結控制項所建立宣告式的參數`DeleteParameters`項目，以及已加入的參數所有合併事件處理常式。When the method is called, the data fields from the data-bound control, the parameters that were created declaratively in the `DeleteParameters` element, and the parameters that were added in the event handler are all merged. （如需詳細資訊，請參閱上一節）。物件接著會嘗試尋找要呼叫的方法。(For more information, see the preceding section.) The object then attempts to find a method to call. 首先，它會尋找名稱中指定的一或多個方法屬性。First, it looks for one or more methods with the name that is specified in the property. 如果找到相符項目，則擲回例外狀況。If no match is found, an exception is thrown. 如果找到相符項目，則會尋找相符的參數名稱。If a match is found, it then looks for matching parameter names. 例如，假設所指定的型別屬性有兩個方法，名為`DeleteARecord`。For example, suppose the type that is specified by the property has two methods named `DeleteARecord`. 一`DeleteARecord`有一個參數， `ID`，和其他`DeleteARecord`有兩個參數，`Name`和`Number`。One `DeleteARecord` has one parameter, `ID`, and the other `DeleteARecord` has two parameters, `Name` and `Number`. 如果集合中有一個名為的參數`ID`，則`DeleteARecord`方法只`ID`參數稱為。If the collection has only one parameter named `ID`, the `DeleteARecord` method with just the `ID` parameter is called. 參數的型別不會檢查在解析方法。The type of the parameter is not checked in resolving the methods. 參數的順序並不重要。The order of the parameters does not matter. 如果屬性設定，方法解決了不同的方式。If the property is set, the method is resolved in a different way. 中所指定名稱的方法會尋找中指定屬性，會採用一個參數的型別，屬性。The looks for a method with the name that is specified in the property that takes one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 在此情況下，參數名稱不重要。In this case, the name of the parameter does not matter. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的物件和控制項刪除資料。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to delete data. 第二個程式碼範例示範`EmployeeLogic`第一個程式碼範例中使用的類別。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項使用商務物件和控制項刪除資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 一開始，控制項會顯示所有員工，使用的方法，由一組屬性以從中擷取資料`EmployeeLogic`物件。Initially, the control displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因為屬性設定為`true`，則控制項自動顯示**刪除** 按鈕。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果您按一下**刪除** 按鈕，刪除作業會執行使用的方法，由屬性和任何參數中指定集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the delete operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此範例中，也會執行一些前置處理和後置處理步驟。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`委派呼叫以處理事件之前執行作業，而`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委派呼叫以處理後作業完成執行例外狀況處理的事件。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed to perform exception handling. 在此範例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`會擲回，它由`NorthwindDataException`委派。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by the `NorthwindDataException` delegate. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範`EmployeeLogic`上述的程式碼範例中使用的類別。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/northwindemployee10.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/northwindemployee10.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得包含 方法所用參數的參數集合。

value.span: ，包含 方法所使用的參數。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名稱和參數中所包含的類型集合的名稱和參數的類型，必須符合方法簽章。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters in the method signature. 參數名稱會受到屬性且區分大小寫。The parameter names are affected by the property and are case-sensitive. 集合中的參數取決於資料中的資料繫結控制項，以宣告方式指定的參數而以程式設計方式加入的參數。The parameters in the collection depend on the data that is in the data-bound control, the parameters that are specified declaratively, and the parameters that are added programmatically. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 參數合併 」，在並[使用的參數，與 ObjectDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information, see "Parameter Merging" in and [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). 屬性會擷取屬性所含相關聯的物件控制項。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. 如需有關參數合併、 物件存留期，以及方法解析的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see . ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的物件和控制項刪除資料。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to delete data. 第二個程式碼範例示範`EmployeeLogic`第一個程式碼範例中使用的類別。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的屬性控制項使用商務物件和控制項刪除資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of the control with a business object and a control to delete data. 一開始，控制項會顯示所有員工，使用的方法，由一組屬性以從中擷取資料`EmployeeLogic`物件。Initially, the control displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因為屬性設定為`true`，則控制項自動顯示**刪除** 按鈕。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果您按一下**刪除** 按鈕，具有兩個參數呼叫事件。If you click the **Delete** button, the event is called with two parameters. 一個參數，也`EmpID`，來自控制項，並會根據屬性。One parameter, `EmpID`, comes from the control, and is based on the property. 另一個參數是來自宣告式屬性。The other parameter comes from the declarative property. `EmployeeLogic`類別的多載`DeleteEmployee`方法。The `EmployeeLogic` class overloads the `DeleteEmployee` method. 一個多載會採用`NorthwindEmployee`參數，以及其他會採用名為的參數`anID`。One overload takes a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter, and the other takes an parameter named `anID`. 在 事件中的項目屬性會調整為包含只有一個名為的參數`anID`中的值取代`original_EmpID`。In the event, the entries in the property are adjusted to include only one parameter named `anID` with the value from `original_EmpID`. 當事件處理常式存在時，比對`DeleteEmployee`呼叫方法。When the event handler exists, the matching `DeleteEmployee` method is called. 下列程式碼範例顯示的網頁來顯示控制項和控制代碼事件。The following code example shows the Web page that displays the control and handles the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11/CS/objds11cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11/VB/objds11vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範`EmployeeLogic`上述的程式碼範例中使用的類別。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11/CS/northwindemployee11.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11/VB/northwindemployee11.vb#2)]

summary.span: 在 作業之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before a operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件來執行特定應用程式時，用來驗證參數的值，或變更之前的參數值的其他初始化控制項執行刪除作業。Handle the event to perform additional initialization that is specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the delete operation. 會提供做為參數集合，即可存取屬性，它由物件。The parameters are available as an collection that is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 您可以藉由設定取消刪除作業的屬性至`true`。You can cancel the delete operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的物件和控制項刪除資料。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to delete data. 第二個程式碼範例示範`EmployeeLogic`第一個程式碼範例中使用的類別。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項使用商務物件和控制項刪除資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 一開始，控制項會顯示所有員工，使用的方法，由一組屬性以從中擷取資料`EmployeeLogic`物件。Initially, the control displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因為屬性設定為`true`，則控制項自動顯示**刪除** 按鈕。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果您按一下**刪除** 按鈕，刪除作業會執行使用的方法，由屬性和任何參數中指定集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the delete operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此範例中，也會執行一些前置處理和後置處理步驟。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`委派呼叫以處理事件之前執行作業，而`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委派呼叫以處理後作業完成執行例外狀況處理的事件。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed to perform exception handling. 在此範例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`會擲回，它由`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`方法。In this code example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範`EmployeeLogic`上述的程式碼範例中使用的類別。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 控制項是否啟用了資料快取。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control has data caching enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用了資料來源控制項的資料快取則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if data caching is enabled for the data source control; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援的資料快取。The control supports data caching. 雖然快取資料，呼叫方法會擷取快取中的資料而非建立商務物件的執行個體，然後呼叫其資料的方法。While data is cached, calls to the method retrieve data from the cache rather than the creating an instance of the business object and calling its data method. 當快取過期時，方法擷取商務物件中的資料，並再次快取資料。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the business object, and then caches the data again. 控制項自動快取資料時屬性設定為`true`而屬性設為大於 0，表示快取會儲存資料的快取項目之前的秒數會被捨棄。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 值為 0 表示無限長的快取。A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache. ## Examples 下列三個範例顯示網頁，程式碼後置頁面類別，並從 Northwind 資料庫中的 [員工] 資料表中擷取記錄的資料存取類別。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that retrieve records from the Employees table in the Northwind database. 第一個範例顯示包含兩個網頁控制項控制項，和控制項。The first example shows a Web page that contains two controls, a control, and a control. 第一個控制項和控制項用以擷取並顯示資料庫中的員工名稱。The first control and the control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database. 第二個控制項和控制項用以擷取並顯示所選取使用者的員工記錄。The second control and the control are used to retrieve and display the employee record that is selected by the user. 啟用快取控制項。Caching is enabled for the control. 因此，每一筆記錄會擷取從資料庫一次。Therefore, each record is retrieved only one time from the database. 屬性設定為"EmployeeDetails"，但任何字串值可做為索引鍵。The property is set to "EmployeeDetails", but any string value can work as the key. 網頁也包括使用者可以按一下到期的快取的資料的控制項。The Web page also includes a control that the user can click to expire the cached data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default2.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default2.aspx#3)] 第二個範例顯示的處理常式事件和處理常式事件的控制項。The second example shows a handler for the event and a handler for the event of the control. 事件處理常式設定為以索引鍵建立的快取項目值。The event handler creates a cache item with a key set to the value. 事件處理常式中移除快取項目索引鍵是否等於值。The event handler removes the cache item whose key is equal to the value. 移除快取項目時，則所有相依於索引鍵的快取的資料已過期。When the cache item is removed, all the cached data that is dependent on the key is expired. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default2.aspx.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default2.aspx.vb#4)] 第三個範例會顯示與 Northwind 資料庫互動的資料存取類別。The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database. 類別會使用 LINQ 來查詢 [員工] 資料表。The class uses LINQ to query the Employees table. 這個範例需要 LINQ to SQL 類別代表 Northwind 資料庫的 Employees 資料表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and the Employees table. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建立的 LINQ to SQL 類別，在 Web 專案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnablePaging { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EnablePaging : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出資料來源控制項是否支援對其擷取的資料集進行分頁。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data source control supports paging through the set of data that it retrieves.

value.span: 如果資料來源控制項支援對其擷取的資料進行分頁則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the data source control supports paging through the data it retrieves; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分頁控制項由設定， ， ，並屬性和商務物件中具有正確的參數定義選取的方法。Paging by the control is handled by setting the , , , and properties of the and defining a select method in the business object with the proper parameters. 當屬性設定為`true`，則集合包含要求的第一個資料列和要求的資料列數目的兩個額外參數。When the property is set to `true`, the collection includes two additional parameters for the first row that is requested and the number of rows that are requested. 這兩個參數所定義的命名和屬性。These two parameters are named as defined by the and properties. `Select`方法應傳回的資料列，指定索引處開始要求的數目。The `Select` method should return the requested number of rows, starting at the specified index. 由於頁面大小，資料可能會不平均分配，最後一頁可能包含較少的資料列。Because the data might not divide evenly by the page size, the last page might contain fewer rows. 因此，要求資料列數目是實際上會傳回的資料列的最大數目。Thus, the number of rows that are requested is actually the maximum number of rows that are returned. 資料繫結控制項相關聯的資料繫結控制項上啟用分頁時，呼叫`Select`方法的起始索引和所需的資料列數目。When paging is enabled on the associated data-bound control, the data-bound control calls the `Select` method with the start index and number of rows that are required. 此外，如果屬性設定，將資料繫結控制項呈現的頁面巡覽區控制項之前呼叫的方法。Additionally, if the property is set, the data-bound control calls the method before rendering the pager controls. 例如，如果控制項的頁面大小為 5，而且所指定的方法已啟用分頁屬性會傳回 20，只有 4 個頁面都會顯示在頁面巡覽區。For example, if a control has paging enabled with a page size of 5, and the method that is specified by the property returns 20, only 4 pages are displayed in the pager. 屬性會將委派給屬性物件。The property delegates to the property of the object. ## Examples 下列三個範例顯示網頁，程式碼後置頁面類別，讓使用者挑選的多少筆記錄會顯示在頁面中的資料存取類別。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable the user to pick how many records are displayed in the page. 包含網頁控制項屬性設定為`true`。The Web page contains an control whose property is set to `true`. 屬性設定為在查詢中傳回的記錄總數的方法名稱。The property is set to the name of a method that returns the total number of records in the query. 屬性和屬性都設為用於 Select 方法參數的名稱。The property and the property are set to the names of the parameters that are used in the Select method. 這個頁面也包含控制項。The page also contains a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx#1)] 第二個範例顯示的處理常式事件的控制項。The second example shows a handler for the event of the control. 處理常式集合中的程式碼使用者選取的屬性。The code in the handler sets the property to the user's selection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx.vb#2)] 第三個範例會顯示 Customers 資料表中擷取資料的資料存取類別。The third example shows the data access class that retrieves data from the Customers table. 它包含一個名為方法`GetSubsetOfEmployees`，為指派給屬性控制項。It includes a method named `GetSubsetOfEmployees`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 此範例也包含一個名為方法`GetEmployeeCount`，為指派給屬性控制項。The example also includes a method named `GetEmployeeCount`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 類別會使用 LINQ 來查詢 [客戶] 資料表。The class uses LINQ to query the Customers table. 這個範例需要 LINQ to SQL 類別代表 Customers 資料表與 Northwind 資料庫。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Customers table. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建立的 LINQ to SQL 類別，在 Web 專案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/App_Code/CustomerLogic.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/App_Code/CustomerLogic.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FilterExpression { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.FilterExpression : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定呼叫 屬性所指定之方法時套用的篩選條件運算式。

span.span: Gets or sets a filtering expression that is applied when the method that is specified by the property is called.

value.span: 表示使用 屬性識別之方法或函式擷取資料時，所套用之篩選條件運算式的字串。

span.span: A string that represents a filtering expression that is applied when data is retrieved by using the method or function identified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援篩選的資料時，才方法會傳回或物件。The control supports filtering data only when the method returns a or object. 用於語法屬性是一個格式字串樣式運算式。The syntax that is used for the property is a format string–style expression. 篩選條件運算式語法是相同的語法可接受的屬性。The filter expression syntax is the same syntax that is accepted by the property. 如果您新增參數至集合，您也可以包含格式字串預留位置。If you add parameters to the collection, you can also include format string placeholders. 例如，包含`"{0}"`中要取代的參數值的運算式。For example, include `"{0}"` in the expression to substitute for parameter values. 依照中的參數索引來取代預留位置集合。The placeholders are replaced according to the index of the parameter in the collection. 您可以包含在參數屬性。You can include parameters in the property. 如果參數的型別是字串或字元類型，請使用單引號括住的參數。If the type of the parameter is a string or character type, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks. 如果參數是數值類型，則不需要引號。Quotation marks are not required if the parameter is a numeric type. 集合包含的參數預留位置中找到的評估屬性。The collection contains the parameters that are evaluated for the placeholders that are found in the property. 屬性會將委派給屬性相關聯的物件控制項。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. > [!NOTE] > 您應該驗證您從用戶端接收任何篩選參數值。You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 執行階段只是篩選條件運算式會取代參數值，以及它套用至或是所傳回的物件方法。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the or object that is returned by the method. 如果您使用基於安全性考量，以限制傳回，您必須先驗證參數值，篩選發生之前的項目數的屬性。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以顯示 已篩選的資料，使用要擷取的中介層商務物件中的資料控制項和控制項來顯示結果。The following code example demonstrates how remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件來執行特定應用程式時，用來驗證參數的值，或變更之前的參數值的其他初始化控制項執行插入作業。Handle the event to perform additional initialization that is specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the insert operation. 會提供做為參數集合，即可存取屬性，它由物件。The parameters are available as an collection that is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的物件和控制項以插入資料。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二個程式碼範例提供中介層商務物件中的第一個程式碼範例所使用的範例。The second code example provides an example of the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項使用商務物件和控制項以插入資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 一開始，會顯示新`NorthwindEmployee`記錄，以及自動產生**插入** 按鈕。Initially, the displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 資料輸入的欄位之後控制項中按一下 [**插入**] 按鈕。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button. 屬性會識別哪一種方法執行插入作業。The property identifies which method performs the insert operation. 在此範例中，`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法用來執行插入; 不過，它需要`NorthwindEmployee`来插入資料的參數。In this example, the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is used to perform an insert; however, it requires a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter to insert the data. 基於這個理由，這些字串控制項將自動是不夠的。For this reason, the collection of strings that the control passes automatically is not sufficient. `NorthwindEmployeeInserting`委派處理物件事件，並可讓您操作之前的輸入的參數作業進行時。The `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` delegate is an object that handles the event and enables you to manipulate the input parameters before the operation proceeds. 因為`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法需要`NorthwindEmployee`物件做為參數，一個建立使用字串的集合，會加入至使用的參數名稱的集合 (`ne`) 該方法所預期。Because the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method requires a `NorthwindEmployee` object as a parameter, one is created using the collection of strings and is added to the collection using a parameter name (`ne`) that the method expects. 使用現有的中介層物件，當做資料來源的類型和方法的設計不是專門用來搭配使用時，您可能會執行這些步驟控制項。You might perform steps like these when using an existing middle-tier object as a data source with types and methods that are not designed specifically for use with the control. 當執行作業時，所識別的方法稱為屬性。When the operation is performed, the method that is identified by the property is called. 如果`Insert`物件的方法具有包含參數，參數的方法簽章集合必須包含的參數名稱與相符的方法簽章參數方法順利完成。If the `Insert` method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the collection must contain a parameter with names that match the method signature parameters for the method to complete successfully. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/objds4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/objds4vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例提供上述的程式碼範例使用的中介層商務物件的範例。The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 在程式碼範例是由兩個基本類別所組成：The code example consists of two basic classes: - `EmployeeLogic`類別，這是無狀態的類別封裝商務邏輯。The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateless class that encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee`類別，這是包含只載入和保存資料層中的資料所需的基本功能的模型類別。The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 額外`NorthwindDataException`類別為了方便起見提供。An additional `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience. 如需完整的實用範例，您必須編譯，並使用這些類別。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes. `UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法未完全實作，因此您會將資料插入 Northwind Traders 資料庫時您試驗此範例。The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/northwindemployee4.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/northwindemployee4.vb#2)]

member this.InsertMethod : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項叫用以插入資料之方法或函式的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the control invokes to insert data.

value.span: 字串，表示 用於插入資料之方法或函式的名稱。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the uses to insert data.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 商務物件會假設為一次，而不是批次中插入資料的一筆記錄。The business object is assumed to insert data one record at a time, rather than in a batch. 屬性會將委派給屬性相關聯的物件物件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the object. ## 物件存留期Object Lifetime 所識別的方法屬性可以是執行個體方法或`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中) 方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果是執行個體方法，商務物件會建立和終結每次指定的方法稱為屬性。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method specified by the property is called. 您可以處理並事件，以使用之前的商務物件屬性稱為。You can handle the and events to work with the business object before the property is called. 您也可以處理所指定的方法後，引發的事件稱為屬性。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method that is specified by the property is called. 如果商務物件會實作介面，方法會終結物件之前呼叫。If the business object implements the interface, the method is called before the object is destroyed. 如果方法`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中)，不會建立商務物件，而且您無法處理， ，和事件。If the method is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the business object is never created and you cannot handle the , , and events. ## 合併的參數Parameter Merging 參數會加入至三個來源的集合：Parameters are added to the collection from three sources: - 從資料繫結控制項，在執行階段。From the data-bound control, at run time. - 從`InsertParameters`項目，以宣告方式。From the `InsertParameters` element, declaratively. - 從`Inserting`方法，以程式設計的方式。From the `Inserting` method, programmatically. 首先，將資料繫結控制項所產生的任何參數新增至集合。First, any parameters that are generated from data-bound controls are added to the collection. 比方說，如果控制項所繫結具有資料行的控制項`Name`並`Number`，參數`Name`和`Number`加入至集合。For example, if the control is bound to a control that has the columns `Name` and `Number`, the parameters for `Name` and `Number` are added to the collection. 這些參數的資料類型是`string`。The data type of these parameters is `string`. 下一步，參數中所列`InsertParameters`新增項目。Next, the parameters that are listed in the `InsertParameters` element are added. 如果中的參數`InsertParameters`在找到具有相同名稱做為已在為參數的項目集合中，現有的參數會修改成符合參數中指定`InsertParameters`項目。If a parameter in the `InsertParameters` element is found with the same name as a parameter that is already in the collection, the existing parameter is modified to match the parameter that is specified in the `InsertParameters` element. 一般而言，這用來修改參數中的資料型別。Typically, this is used to modify the type of the data in the parameter. 最後，您可以透過程式設計方式加入和移除參數之前，就會發生的事件方法執行。Finally, you can programmatically add and remove parameters in the event, which occurs before the method is run. 參數會合併之後，就會解決方法。The method is resolved after the parameters are merged. 方法解析會在下一節中討論。Method resolution is discussed in the next section. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您應該驗證您從用戶端接收任何參數值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 執行階段只需用到參數值來取代屬性。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. ## 方法解析Method Resolution 當呼叫方法時，資料欄位從資料繫結控制項所建立宣告式的參數`InsertParameters`項目，以及已加入的參數所有合併事件處理常式。When the method is called, the data fields from the data-bound control, the parameters that were created declaratively in the `InsertParameters` element, and the parameters that were added in the event handler are all merged. （如需詳細資訊，請參閱上一節）。物件接著會嘗試尋找要呼叫的方法。(For more information, see the preceding section.) The object then attempts to find a method to call. 首先，它會尋找名稱中指定的一或多個方法屬性。First, it looks for one or more methods with the name that is specified in the property. 如果找到相符項目，則擲回例外狀況。If no match is found, an exception is thrown. 如果找到相符項目，則會尋找相符的參數名稱。If a match is found, it then looks for matching parameter names. 例如，假設所指定的型別屬性有兩個方法，名為`InsertARecord`。For example, suppose a type that is specified by the property has two methods named `InsertARecord`. 一`InsertARecord`有一個參數， `ID`，和其他`InsertARecord`有兩個參數，`Name`和`Number`。One `InsertARecord` has one parameter, `ID`, and the other `InsertARecord` has two parameters, `Name` and `Number`. 如果集合中有一個名為的參數`ID`，則`InsertARecord`方法只`ID`參數稱為。If the collection has only one parameter named `ID`, the `InsertARecord` method with just the `ID` parameter is called. 參數的型別不會檢查在解析方法。The type of the parameter is not checked in resolving the methods. 參數的順序並不重要。The order of the parameters does not matter. 如果屬性設定，方法解決了不同的方式。If the property is set, the method is resolved in a different way. 中所指定名稱的方法會尋找中指定屬性，會採用一個參數的型別，屬性。The looks for a method with the name that is specified in the property that takes one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 在此情況下，參數名稱不重要。In this case, the name of the parameter does not matter. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的物件和控制項以插入資料。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二個程式碼範例提供中介層商務物件中的第一個程式碼範例所使用的範例。The second code example provides an example of the middle-tier business object 一開始，會顯示新`NorthwindEmployee`記錄，以及自動產生**插入** 按鈕。Initially, the displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 資料輸入的欄位之後控制項中按一下 [**插入**] 按鈕。After you 不過，它需要`NorthwindEmployee`来插入資料的參數。In this example, the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is used to perform an insert; however, it requires a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter to insert the data. 基於這個理由，這些字串控制項將自動是不夠的。For this reason, the collection of strings that the control passes automatically is not sufficient. `NorthwindEmployeeInserting`委派處理物件事件，並可讓您操作之前的輸入的參數作業進行時。The `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` delegate is an object that handles the event and enables you to manipulate the input parameters before the operation proceeds. 因為`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法需要`NorthwindEmployee`物件做為參數，一個建立使用字串的集合，會加入至使用的參數名稱的集合 (`ne`) 該方法所預期。Because the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method requires a `NorthwindEmployee` object as a parameter, one is created using the collection of strings and is added to the collection using a parameter name (`ne`) that the method expects. 使用現有的中介層物件，當做資料來源的類型和方法的設計不是專門用來搭配使用時，您可能會執行這些步驟控制項。You might perform steps like these when using an existing middle-tier object as a data source with types and methods that are not designed specifically for use with the control. 當執行作業時，所識別的方法稱為屬性。When the operation is performed, the method that is identified by the property is called. 如果`Insert`物件的方法具有包含參數，參數的方法簽章集合必須包含的參數名稱與相符的方法簽章參數方法順利完成。If the `Insert` method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the collection must contain a parameter with names that match the method signature parameters for the method to complete successfully. summary.span: 取得包含 屬性所使用參數的參數集合。
