remarks.format: ## Remarks 名稱和參數中所包含的類型集合的名稱和型別中的參數，必須符合屬性簽章。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters that are in the property signature. 參數名稱會區分大小寫。The parameter names are case sensitive. 使用提供的參數，這類的資料繫結控制項時並控制項，控制項自動合併任何明確的參數集合中指定的參數資料繫結控制項所提供。When working with data-bound controls that supply parameters, such as the and controls, the control automatically merges any parameters that are explicitly specified in the collection with the parameters that are provided by the data-bound control. 這很重要，因為資料繫結控制項一律會提供做為其參數類型，而且如果方法簽章包含數值或日期類型，您必須明確地包含參數，以在具有正確的類型集合。This is important because data-bound controls always supply their parameters as types, and if the method signature includes numeric or date types, you must explicitly include a parameter in the collection with the correct type. 否則，控制項嘗試轉換的參數，根據集合中的參數所定義的類型。Otherwise, the control attempts to cast the parameters according to the type that is defined by the parameters in the collection. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，與 ObjectDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information, see [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). 屬性會擷取屬性所含相關聯控制項。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the that is associated with the control. 如需有關參數合併、 物件存留期，以及方法解析的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see . ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的物件和控制項以插入資料。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二個程式碼範例提供的範例實作`Insert`第一個程式碼範例中使用的方法。The second code example provides an example implementation of the `Insert` method that is used in the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項使用商務物件和控制項以插入資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 一開始，會顯示文字方塊中，您可以在此輸入新的資料`NorthwindEmployee`記錄，以及自動產生**插入** 按鈕。Initially, the displays text boxes in which you can enter data for a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 資料輸入的欄位之後控制項中按一下 [**插入**] 按鈕。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button. 屬性會識別哪一種方法執行插入作業。The property identifies which method performs the insert operation. 如果您按一下**插入** 按鈕，此作業會執行使用的方法，由屬性和任何參數中指定集合。If you click the **Insert** button, the operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此範例中，有一個參數指定於集合對應至監督員的識別碼。In this code example, one parameter is specified in the collection that corresponds to the supervisor's ID. 這是因為即使 ID 會顯示在集合控制項作為物件，它會以字串形式傳遞控制項。This is because even though the ID is displayed in the collection for the control as a object, it is passed as a string to the control. 藉由明確地將它加入集合屬性設定為的值，它會傳遞正確給方法的，而非字串。By adding it explicitly to the collection with a property set to the value, it will be passed correctly by the to the method as an , not as a string. 當執行作業時，所識別的方法稱為屬性。When the operation is performed, the method that is identified by the property is called. 如果物件的方法具有包含參數，參數的方法簽章集合必須包含具有符合的方法簽章參數的參數方法順利完成。If the method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the collection must contain parameters that have names that match the method signature parameters for the method to complete successfully. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您應該驗證您從用戶端接收任何參數值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 執行階段只需用到參數值來取代屬性。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8/CS/objds8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8/VB/objds8vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例提供的範例實作`Insert`上述的程式碼範例會使用的方法。The following code example provides an example implementation of the `Insert` method that the preceding code example uses. `InsertNewEmployeeWrapper`方法會加入至`EmployeeLogic`中所提供的中介層物件以便更輕鬆地使用物件的類別概觀在 Web 的情況下，不大幅重寫為實際的控制項商務邏輯。The `InsertNewEmployeeWrapper` method is added to the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier object that is provided in the class overview to enable the object to work more easily with the control in Web scenarios, without a substantial rewrite to the actual business logic. 若要執行範例時，您必須擁有`NorthwindEmployee`類別中提供類別概觀。To run the example, you must have the `NorthwindEmployee` class that is provided in the class overview. 此範例說明如何連接來取得新的資料庫記錄中的資料，使用參數的商務物件方法。This example illustrates only how to connect the to a business object method that gets data for a new database record by using parameters. 此範例不會新增記錄至資料庫，因為`Save`方法的`NorthwindEmployee`類別不包含程式碼，以更新資料庫。The example does not add records to the database, because the `Save` method of the `NorthwindEmployee` class does not include code to update the database. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來支援資料來源分頁。The property is used to support data source paging. 如需如何也支援傳呼控制項，請參閱。For information about how paging is supported by the control, see . 屬性會將委派給屬性相關聯的物件控制項。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. ## Examples 下列三個範例顯示網頁，程式碼後置頁面類別，讓使用者挑選的多少筆記錄會顯示在頁面中的資料存取類別。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable the user to pick how many records are displayed in the page. 包含網頁控制項屬性設定為`true`。The Web page contains an control whose property is set to `true`. 屬性設定為在查詢中傳回的記錄總數的方法名稱。The property is set to the name of a method that returns the total number of records in the query. 屬性和屬性都設為用於 Select 方法參數的名稱。The property and the property are set to the names of the parameters that are used in the Select method. 這個頁面也包含控制項。The page also contains a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx#1)] 第二個範例顯示的處理常式事件的控制項。The second example shows a handler for the event of the control. 處理常式集合中的程式碼使用者選取的屬性。The code in the handler sets the property to the user's selection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx.vb#2)] 第三個範例會顯示 Customers 資料表中擷取資料的資料存取類別。The third example shows the data access class that retrieves data from the Customers table. 它包含一個名為方法`GetSubsetOfEmployees`，為指派給屬性控制項。It includes a method named `GetSubsetOfEmployees`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 此範例也包含一個名為方法`GetEmployeeCount`，為指派給屬性控制項。The example also includes a method named `GetEmployeeCount`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 類別會使用 LINQ 來查詢 [客戶] 資料表。The class uses LINQ to query the Customers table. 這個範例需要 LINQ to SQL 類別代表 Customers 資料表與 Northwind 資料庫。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Customers table. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建立的 LINQ to SQL 類別，在 Web 專案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件，在商務物件上呼叫其他方法設定屬性，或執行其他特有的商務物件之前, 的初始化物件呼叫商務物件資料的方法來執行資料作業.Handle the event to call other methods on the business object, set properties, or perform other initialization that is specific to the business object before the object calls the business object data method to perform a data operation. 存取物件的參考屬性，它由物件。A reference to the object is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 識別執行資料作業的方法是否`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中)，則和永遠不會引發事件。If the method that is identified to perform the data operation is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the and events are never raised. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ObjectCreating As ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler

summary.span: 在建立 屬性識別的物件之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before the object that is identified by the property is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 識別執行資料作業的方法是否`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中)，則和永遠不會引發事件。If the method that is identified to perform the data operation is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the and events are never raised. 控制項會自動呼叫的商務物件來建立使用反映它的執行個體的預設建構函式。The control automatically calls the default constructor of a business object to create an instance of it using reflection. 處理事件，以明確地呼叫另一個建構函式，並將結果物件的執行個體相關聯的屬性物件。Handle the event to explicitly call another constructor, and set the instance of the object that results to the property of the associated object. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的物件和控制項來顯示資訊。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to display information. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中使用的中介層商務物件。The second code example provides the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項使用商務物件和控制項來顯示資訊。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 您也可以建立 （依據時間或資源） 到網頁上所執行的每個資料作業的成本相當高的商務物件。You might work with a business object that is very expensive to create (in terms of time or resources) for every data operation your Web page performs. 高度耗費資源的物件所使用的一種方法可能會建立它的執行個體一次，然後加以和快取的後續作業，而不是建立和終結針對每個資料作業。One way to work with an expensive object might be to create an instance of it once, and then cache it for subsequent operations instead of creating and destroying it for every data operation. > [!NOTE] > 在生產環境應用程式中，多個要求可能會同時使用相同的執行個體。In a production application, multiple requests might end up simultaneously using the same instance. 因此，物件必須實作以執行緒安全的方式。Therefore, the object needs to be implemented in a thread-safe manner. 此程式碼範例會示範這個模式。This code example demonstrates this pattern. 您可以處理首先，檢查物件的快取，並只建立物件的執行個體，如果其中一個已快取的事件。You can handle the event to check the cache for an object first, and only create an instance of the object, if one is not already cached. 然後，處理快取供未來使用，而不是終結該商務物件的事件。Then, handle the event to cache the business object for future use, instead of destroying it. 在此範例中，的屬性物件設定為`true`導向不呼叫物件上的方法。In this code example, the property of the object is set to `true` to direct the to not call method on the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/objds16cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/objds16vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例提供上述的程式碼範例會使用的範例中介層商務物件。The following code example provides the example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 在程式碼範例包含基本的商務物件，定義由`EmployeeLogic`類別，這是可設定狀態的類別封裝商務邏輯。The code example consists of a basic business object, defined by the `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateful class that encapsulates business logic. 如需完整的實用範例，您必須編譯為程式庫的這段程式碼，並使用這些類別，從 ASP.NET 網頁 （.aspx 檔案）。For a complete working example, you must compile this code as a library and use these classes from an ASP.NET page (.aspx file). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/northwindemployee16.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/northwindemployee16.vb#2)]

summary.span: 在捨棄 屬性識別的物件之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before the object that is identified by the property is discarded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 商務物件的執行個體就會捨棄之前，一律會引發事件。The event is always raised before the instance of the business object is discarded. 如果商務物件會實作介面，之後會引發這個事件會呼叫方法。If the business object implements the interface, the method is called after this event is raised. 處理事件可用來呼叫其他方法，在物件上設定屬性，或執行清理之前終結物件的特定物件。Handle the event to call other methods on the object, set properties, or perform clean-up that is specific to the object before the object is destroyed. 存取物件的參考屬性，它由物件。A reference to the object is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 當您使用控制項與 LINQ to SQL 類別中，您必須取消處理常式中的資料內容類別的處置事件。When you use a control with a LINQ to SQL class, you must cancel the disposing of the data-context class in an handler for the event. 這是必要步驟，因為 LINQ to SQL 支援延後的執行，而控制項嘗試在選取作業之後處置資料內容。This step is necessary because LINQ to SQL supports deferred execution, whereas the control tries to dispose the data context after the Select operation. [就會引發事件時](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)物件所繫結至資料的項目。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的物件和控制項來顯示資訊。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to display information. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中使用的中介層商務物件。The second code example provides the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項使用商務物件和控制項來顯示資訊。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 您也可以建立 （依據時間或資源） 到網頁上所執行的每個資料作業的成本相當高的商務物件。You might work with a business object that is very expensive to create (in terms of time or resources) for every data operation your Web page performs. 高度耗費資源的物件所使用的一種方法可能會建立它的執行個體一次，然後加以和快取的後續作業，而不是建立和終結針對每個資料作業。One way to work with an expensive object might be to create an instance of it once, and then cache it for subsequent operations instead of creating and destroying it for every data operation. 此範例會示範這個模式。This example demonstrates this pattern. 您可以處理首先，檢查物件的快取，並只建立的執行個體，如果其中一個已快取的事件。You can handle the event to check the cache for an object first, and only create an instance of it, if one is not already cached. 然後，處理快取供未來使用，而不是終結該商務物件的事件。Then, handle the event to cache the business object for future use, instead of destroying it. 在此範例中，的屬性物件設定為`true`導向不呼叫物件上的方法。In this code example, the property of the object is set to `true` to direct the to not call the method on the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/objds16cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/objds16vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例提供上述的程式碼範例會使用的範例中介層商務物件。The following code example provides the example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 在程式碼範例包含基本的商務物件，定義由`EmployeeLogic`類別，這是可設定狀態的類別封裝商務邏輯。The code example consists of a basic business object, defined by the `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateful class that encapsulates business logic. 如需完整的實用範例，您必須編譯為程式庫的這段程式碼，並使用這些類別，從 ASP.NET 網頁 （.aspx 檔案）。For a complete working example, you must compile this code as a library and use these classes from an ASP.NET page (.aspx file). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/northwindemployee16.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/northwindemployee16.vb#2)] 下列範例示範如何處理事件時使用與 LINQ to SQL 類別的控制項。The following example shows how to handle the event when using an control with a LINQ to SQL class. ```vb Public Sub ExampleObjectDisposing(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs) e.Cancel = True End Sub ``` ```csharp public void ExampleObjectDisposing(object sender, ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs e) { e.Cancel = true; } ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OldValuesParameterFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.OldValuesParameterFormatString : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定格式字串，套用至傳遞給 或 方法之原始值的參數名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets a format string to apply to the names of the parameters for original values that are passed to the or methods.

value.span: 字串，表示套用至傳遞給 或 方法之任何 或索引鍵參數名稱的格式字串。

span.span: A string that represents a format string applied to the names of any or key parameters passed to the or methods.

value.span: 預設值是」{0}"，這表示參數名稱是欄位名稱。

span.span: The default is "{0}", which means the parameter name is the field name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性套用至主索引鍵，例如所`DataKeyNames`屬性的資料繫結控制項，或刪除和更新案例其中屬性設定為值，以及一組原始值會傳遞至對應的資料方法。The value of the property is applied to primary keys only, such as those that are identified with the `DataKeyNames` property of a data-bound control, or in delete and update scenarios where the property is set to the value, and the set of original values are passed to the corresponding data method. 以下是兩種常見的案例，您可能會在其中變更屬性：The following are two common scenarios where you might change the property: - 您可能想要變更屬性，以區別更新中的舊和新值。You might want to change the property to differentiate between old and new values in updates. 當屬性設定為值，參數的原始和新的值都會加入集合。When the property is set to the value, parameters for both the original and new values are added to the collection. 沒有格式化的字串，具有相同名稱的兩個參數就會建立每個資料欄位。Without the formatting string, two parameters with the same name would be created for each data field. 藉由變更原始值參數的名稱，您可以比較資料與原始的資料來源，以便偵測衝突，並比較索引鍵的值。By changing the name of the original value parameter, you can compare the data to the original data source to detect conflicts and compare key values. - 有些視覺化設計工具會實作特定的命名配置，針對原始值和索引鍵。Some visual designers implement a particular naming scheme for original values and keys. 屬性會將委派給屬性相關聯的物件控制項。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control.

span.span: An that contains event data.

summary.span: 將 事件處理常式加入包含 控制項的網頁。

span.span: Adds a event handler to the page that contains the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫方法在衍生類別中，務必呼叫方法的基底類別，好讓註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的方法可能會有任何方法簽章，但它必須傳回，或衍生自其中一個類型中的下列資料表列出能夠成功呼叫它的控制項。The specified method might have any method signature, but it must return or be derived from one of the types listed in the following table for the control to call it successfully. |傳回型別Return type|動作Action| |-----------------|------------| ||由方法。The is returned by the method.| ||A由使用，並由傳回方法。A is created by using the and returned by the method.| ||由方法。The is returned by the method.| ||第一個的擷取並是所建立並傳回方法。The first of the is extracted and a is created and returned by the method.| ||物件會包裝在一個項目集合，並由傳回方法。The object is wrapped in a one-element collection and returned by the method.| 所識別的方法屬性可以是執行個體方法或`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中) 方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果是執行個體方法，商務物件會建立和終結方法所指定的每次呼叫屬性時，不同之處在於相同的執行個體用來呼叫的方法，由屬性，所指定的方法屬性。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method that is specified by the property is called, except that the same instance is used to call the method that is specified by the property and the method that is specified by the property. 方法會傳回介面。The method returns an interface. 不過，若要啟用快取和篩選案例，傳回的值必須是物件。However, to enable caching and filtering scenarios, the return value must be a object. 雖然類別未實作介面自動擷取控制項的預設值控制項，它會實作。While the class does not implement the interface, the control automatically extracts the default control, which implements the . 再執行作業時，方法呼叫來引發事件。Before the operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理事件來檢查參數的值，以及任何先執行前置處理作業。You can handle the event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a operation. 若要執行資料擷取作業，物件會使用反映來建立物件所識別的執行個體屬性。To perform a data retrieval operation, the object uses reflection to create an instance of the object that is identified by the property. 接著，它呼叫的方法，由會使用所有相關聯的屬性屬性。It then calls the method that is identified by the property, using any associated properties. 在後作業完成時，方法呼叫來引發事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理來檢查任何傳回值、 輸出參數，以及例外狀況，並執行任何後續處理的事件。You can handle the event to examine any return values, output parameters, and exceptions, and to perform any post-processing. 如果屬性會傳回， ，或物件和快取已啟用，從中擷取資料，並將資料儲存至快取期間作業。If the property returns a , , or object and caching is enabled, the retrieves data from and saves data to the cache during the operation. 快取建立時，已捨棄，或重新整理基礎的組合所指定的快取行為和屬性。The cache is created, discarded, or refreshed based on the caching behavior that is specified by the combination of the and properties. 如果屬性會傳回或是物件，和已指定，則會評估與任何提供屬性和結果篩選條件會套用至的期間的資料清單作業。If the property returns a or object, and a property has been specified, it is evaluated with any supplied properties and the resulting filter is applied to the list of data during the operation. 方法會委派給方法相關聯控制項。The method delegates to the method of the that is associated with the control. 如需有關參數合併、 物件存留期，以及方法解析的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see . ## 資料繫結控制項Data-Bound Controls 當控制項控制項相關聯資料繫結，例如控制項，不需要呼叫從網頁程式碼的方法。When the control is associated with a data-bound control, such as the control, it is not necessary to call the method from page code. 方法是直接由叫用資料繫結控制項改。The method is invoked directly by the data-bound control instead. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會識別用來擷取總計資料列計數，以支援資料來源分頁的商務物件方法。The property identifies a business object method that is used to retrieve a total row count, to support data source paging. 屬性會評估，只有當屬性設定為`true`。The property is evaluated only if the property is set to `true`. 屬性會將委派給屬性相關聯的物件控制項。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. 如需如何也支援傳呼控制項，請參閱。For information about how paging is supported by the control, see . ## Examples 下列三個範例顯示網頁，程式碼後置頁面類別，讓使用者挑選的多少筆記錄會顯示在頁面中的資料存取類別。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable the user to pick how many records are displayed in the page. 包含網頁控制項屬性設定為`true`。The Web page contains an control whose property is set to `true`. 屬性設定為在查詢中傳回的記錄總數的方法名稱。The property is set to the name of a method that returns the total number of records in the query. 屬性和屬性都設為用於 Select 方法參數的名稱。The property and the property are set to the names of the parameters that are used in the Select method. 這個頁面也包含控制項。The page also contains a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx#1)] 第二個範例顯示的處理常式事件的控制項。The second example shows a handler for the event of the control. 處理常式集合中的程式碼使用者選取的屬性。The code in the handler sets the property to the user's selection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx.vb#2)] 第三個範例會顯示 Customers 資料表中擷取資料的資料存取類別。The third example shows the data access class that retrieves data from the Customers table. 它包含一個名為方法`GetSubsetOfEmployees`，為指派給屬性控制項。It includes a method named `GetSubsetOfEmployees`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 此範例也包含一個名為方法`GetEmployeeCount`，為指派給屬性控制項。The example also includes a method named `GetEmployeeCount`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 類別會使用 LINQ 來查詢 [客戶] 資料表。The class uses LINQ to query the Customers table. 這個範例需要 LINQ to SQL 類別代表 Customers 資料表與 Northwind 資料庫。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Customers table. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建立的 LINQ to SQL 類別，在 Web 專案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/App_Code/CustomerLogic.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/App_Code/CustomerLogic.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件，來檢查傳回的值或輸出參數的值，或判斷是否發生例外狀況在之後作業已完成。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value or output parameters, or to determine whether an exception was thrown after a operation has completed. 傳回值、 輸出參數和例外狀況處理屬性都是從與事件相關聯的物件。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列三個範例顯示網頁 」、 「 程式碼後置頁面類別和 「 資料存取類別，可讓使用者以擷取和更新 Northwind 資料庫中的 [員工] 資料表中的記錄。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable a user to retrieve and update records in the Employees table in the Northwind database. 第一個範例顯示包含兩個網頁控制項控制項，和控制項。The first example shows a Web page that contains two controls, a control, and a control. 第一個控制項和控制項用以擷取並顯示資料庫中的員工名稱。The first control and the control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database. 第二個控制項和控制項用來擷取、 顯示和修改從 選取使用者的員工記錄的資料。The second control and the control are used to retrieve, display, and modify the data from the employee record that is selected by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 第二個範例示範處理常式和事件。The second example shows handlers for the and events. 事件處理常式序列化的物件，包含從 Employee 資料表中擷取的資料。The event handler serializes the object that contains data that was retrieved from the Employee table. 序列化的物件會儲存在檢視狀態。The serialized object is stored in view state. 事件處理常式會將還原序列化的物件，包含正在更新的資料記錄的原始資料的檢視狀態中。The event handler deserializes the object in view state that contains the original data for the data record that is being updated. 物件，其中包含原始資料做為參數傳遞至 Update 方法。The object that contains the original data is passed as a parameter to the Update method. 原始資料必須傳遞至資料庫，以便它可以用來檢查資料是否已修改另一個處理序。The original data must be passed to the database so that it can be used to check whether the data has been modified by another process. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx.vb#2)] 第三個範例會顯示與 Northwind 資料庫互動的資料存取類別。The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database. 類別會使用 LINQ 來查詢和更新的 Employees 資料表。The class uses LINQ to query and update the Employees table. 這個範例需要 LINQ to SQL 類別代表 Northwind 資料庫與 Employees 資料表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Employees table. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建立的 LINQ to SQL 類別，在 Web 專案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的方法可以有任何方法簽章，但它必須傳回其中一個類型為下表所示能夠成功呼叫它的控制項。The specified method can have any method signature, but it must return one of the types shown in the following table for the control to call it successfully. |傳回類型Return type|動作Action| |-----------------|------------| ||由方法。The is returned by the method.| ||A會使用建立，並由傳回方法。A is created using the and returned by the method.| ||A由方法。A is returned by the method.| ||第一個的擷取時，以及是所建立並傳回方法。The first of the is extracted, and a is created and returned by the method.| ||物件會包裝在一個項目集合，並由傳回方法。The object is wrapped in a one-element collection and returned by the method.| 屬性會將委派給屬性相關聯的物件控制項。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. 當您使用類別來刪除或更新資料，請確定參數名稱設定為控制中集合或集合符合 select 方法所傳回的資料行名稱.When you use the class to delete or update data, make sure that the parameter names configured for the control in the collection or collection match the column names that are returned by the select method. ## 物件存留期Object Lifetime 所識別的方法屬性可以是執行個體方法或`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中) 方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果是執行個體方法，商務物件會建立和終結方法所指定的每次稱為屬性。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method that is specified by the property is called. 您可以處理並事件，以使用之前的方法所指定的商務物件屬性稱為。You can handle the and events to work with the business object before the method that is specified by the property is called. 您也可以處理所指定的方法後，引發的事件稱為屬性。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method that is specified by the property is called. 如果商務物件會實作介面，方法會終結物件之前呼叫。If the business object implements the interface, the method is called before the object is destroyed. 如果方法`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中)，不會建立商務物件，而且您無法處理， ，和事件。If the method is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the business object is never created and you cannot handle the , , and events. ## 合併的參數Parameter Merging 參數會加入至從這些來源的集合：Parameters are added to the collection from these sources: - 以宣告方式從`SelectParameters`項目。Declaratively from the `SelectParameters` element. - 以程式設計方式從`Selecting`方法。Programmatically from the `Selecting` method. 首先，在列出參數`SelectParameters`新增項目。First, the parameters listed in the `SelectParameters` element are added. 第二，以程式設計方式加入和移除參數之前，就會發生的事件方法執行。Second, parameters are programmatically added and removed in the event, which occurs before the method is run. 參數會合併之後，就會解決方法。The method is resolved after the parameters are merged. 方法解析會在下一節中討論。Method resolution is discussed in the next section. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您應該驗證您從用戶端接收任何參數值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 執行階段只需用到參數值來取代屬性。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. ## 方法解析Method Resolution 當呼叫方法時，資料欄位從資料繫結控制項所建立宣告式的參數`SelectParameters`項目，以及已加入的參數所有合併事件處理常式。When the method is called, the data fields from the data-bound control, the parameters that were created declaratively in the `SelectParameters` element, and the parameters that were added in the event handler are all merged. （如需詳細資訊，請參閱上一節）。控制然後嘗試尋找要呼叫的方法。(For more information, see the preceding section.) The control then attempts to find a method to call. 首先，它會尋找名稱中指定的一或多個方法屬性。First, it looks for one or more methods with the name that is specified in the property. 如果找到相符項目，則擲回例外狀況。If no match is found, an exception is thrown. 如果找到相符項目，則會尋找相符的參數名稱。If a match is found, it then looks for matching parameter names. 例如，假設所指定的型別屬性有兩個方法，名為`SelectARecord`。For example, suppose a type that is specified by the property has two methods named `SelectARecord`. 一`SelectARecord`有一個參數， `ID`，和其他`SelectARecord`有兩個參數，`Name`和`Number`。One `SelectARecord` has one parameter, `ID`, and the other `SelectARecord` has two parameters, `Name` and `Number`. 如果集合中有一個名為的參數`ID`，則`SelectARecord`方法只`ID`參數稱為。If the collection has only one parameter named `ID`, the `SelectARecord` method with just the `ID` parameter is called. 參數的型別不會檢查在解析方法。The type of the parameter is not checked in resolving the methods. 參數的順序並不重要。The order of the parameters does not matter. 如果屬性設定，方法解決了不同的方式。If the property is set, the method is resolved in a different way. 中所指定名稱的方法會尋找中指定屬性，會採用一個參數的型別，屬性。The looks for a method with the name that is specified in the property that takes one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 在此情況下，參數名稱不重要。In this case, the name of the parameter does not matter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何控制項可以顯示的資料使用Web Form 網頁上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how a control can display data using an control on a Web Forms page. 識別的部分或完整類別名稱及其屬性和方法，呼叫以擷取資料以其屬性。The identifies a partially or fully qualified class name with its property and a method that is called to retrieve data with its property. 在執行階段，建立物件，並使用反映來呼叫此方法。At run time, the object is created and the method is called using reflection. 控制列舉所指定方法所傳回的集合屬性，並顯示資料。The control enumerates through the collection that is returned by the method that is specified by the property, and displays the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/CS/objds1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/VB/objds1vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得參數的集合，這些參數是由 屬性指定的方法所使用。

value.span: 參數的集合，這些參數是由 屬性指定的方法所使用。

span.span: A collection of parameters that are used by the method specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得屬性相關聯的物件控制項。The property gets the property of the object that is associated with the control. 新增參數集合，以宣告方式是藉由使用`SelectParameters`項目或以程式設計方式中的處理常式事件。You add parameters to the collection declaratively by using the `SelectParameters` element or programmatically in the handler for the event. 在執行階段，參數會列在`SelectParameters`項目會先加入至集合。At run time, parameters listed in the `SelectParameters` element are added to the collection first. 然後加入或移除的處理常式集合中的參數事件。Parameters in the collection are then added or removed by the handler for the event. 就會引發事件之前方法執行。The event is raised before the method is run. 再執行方法，名稱和參數中所包含的類型集合必須符合所指定之方法的簽章屬性。Before the method is run, the names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the signature of the method that is specified by the property. 比方說，如果選取的方法，名為`GetEmployeesByStateAndAge`會採用`string`以及做為參數，整數集合必須包含兩個參數。For example, if a select method named `GetEmployeesByStateAndAge` takes a `string` and an integer as parameters, the collection must contain two parameters. 第一個參數必須解析為字串和第二個參數必須解析成整數。The first parameter must resolve to a string and the second parameter must resolve to an integer. 這兩個參數可以指定在標記中`SelectParameters`項目。Both parameters can be specified in markup in the `SelectParameters` element. 或者，它們可以是可以加入加入事件處理常式或一個參數標記和另一個可以以程式設計方式加入。Alternatively, they can be can be added in the event handler, or one parameter can be added in markup and the other one can be added programmatically. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，與 ObjectDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)而屬性。For more information, see [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4) and the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在程式碼事件處理常式或所指定的方法中屬性，請確定您驗證從用戶端會收到任何參數值。In the code for the event handler or in the method that is specified by the property, make sure that you validate any parameter value that is received from the client. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擷取單一資料記錄，使用控制項，並顯示在控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve a single data record using an control and display it in a control. 控制項會呼叫擷取特定員工資料錄`GetEmployee`方法`EmployeeLogic`類別。The control retrieves a specific employee record by calling the `GetEmployee` method of the `EmployeeLogic` class. `GetEmployee`方法要求員工 ID 參數。The `GetEmployee` method requires an employee ID parameter. 控制項會使用`QueryStringParameter`中建立的標記項目物件，會從 URL 擷取指定的查詢字串參數的值，並將它傳遞給`GetEmployee`方法。The control uses a `QueryStringParameter` element in markup to create a object that will retrieve the value of a specified query-string parameter from the URL and pass it to the `GetEmployee` method. 其他參數類別可用來擷取從其他來源，例如控制項屬性、 表單欄位、 cookie、 ASP.NET 設定檔資料或工作階段狀態的值。Other parameter classes can be used to retrieve values from other sources, such as control properties, form fields, cookies, ASP.NET profile data, or session state. 您也可以使用標記中定義為了將硬式編碼的值傳遞至 select 方法的參數物件。You can also use a parameter object that is defined in markup in order to pass a hard-coded value to the select method. 如需可用的參數類別的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用的參數，以篩選的資料來源控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f)。For more information about parameter classes that are available, see [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f). 若要執行此範例中，您需要下列項目：To run this example, you will need the following: - 具有名為連接字串的網站`NorthwindConnection`連接至 Northwind Traders 資料庫。A Web site that has a connection string named `NorthwindConnection` that connects to the Northwind Traders database. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview. - `EmployeeLogic`類別的其中一個的程式碼範例所示類別概觀。The `EmployeeLogic` class that is shown as one of the code examples for the class overview. 類別檔案必須位於 App_Code 資料夾中。The class file must be located in the App_Code folder. - 範例程式碼可以執行為.aspx 頁面。The sample code can be run as an .aspx page. 如果您要求頁面時不含查詢字串參數時，會顯示一則錯誤訊息。If you request the page without a query-string parameter, an error message is displayed. 如果您要求使用查詢字串，例如頁面`?empid=1`.aspx 檔案的名稱之後, 您會看到詳細資料之要求的員工。If you request the page using a query string such as `?empid=1` after the name of the .aspx file, you will see the details for the requested employee. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3/CS/objds3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3/VB/objds3vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定商務物件的名稱， 參數使用該名稱指定資料來源排序支援的排序運算式。

value.span: 方法參數的名稱，用於指出要用於排序資料的參數。

span.span: The name of the method parameter used to indicate the parameter which is used to sort the data.

value.span: 預設為空字串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來支援資料來源排序。The property is used to support data source sorting. 當上設定屬性物件，並傳遞給方法，值識別的參數名稱，據此排序資料的商務物件方法。When a property is set on the object and passed to the method, the value identifies the parameter name of the business object method according to which the data is sorted. 如果與資料繫結控制項，以逗號分隔的欄位值的形式，後面加上此參數進行傳遞的值相關聯`"ASC"`或`"DESC"`。If the is associated with a data-bound control, the values that are passed to this parameter take the form of comma-separated field values followed by `"ASC"` or `"DESC"`. 例如，在遞增排序的值`Name`會是`"Name ASC"`。For example, the value for an ascending sort on `Name` would be `"Name ASC"`. 屬性會將委派給屬性相關聯的物件控制項。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何實作支援排序的型別。The first code example demonstrates how to implement a type that supports sorting. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何實作的排序運算式。The second code example demonstrates how to implement a sort expression. 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作支援排序的型別。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a type that supports sorting. `SelectMethod`的`SortingData`類別使用參數`sortExpression`。The `SelectMethod` of the `SortingData` class takes a parameter, `sortExpression`. 傳遞至字串`SelectMethod`使用於屬性所傳回的物件`SelectMethod`。The string that is passed to `SelectMethod` is used for the property of the object that is returned by `SelectMethod`. [!code-csharp[ObjectDataSourceSorting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceSorting/CS/SortingData.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObjectDataSourceSorting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceSorting/VB/SortingData.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作的排序運算式。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a sort expression. 在網頁中的程式碼建立的執行個體控制項。The code in the Web page creates an instance of the control. 屬性設定為`SortingData`並屬性設定為`sortExpression`。The property is set to `SortingData` and the property is set to `sortExpression`. 的屬性控制設為 `true`。The property of the control is set to `true`. 當使用者按一下**排序** 按鈕、 欄位名稱`Name`或是`Number`，會傳遞至`SelectMethod`排序參數中。When the user clicks the **Sort** button, the field name, `Name` or `Number`, is passed to `SelectMethod` in the sort parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[ObjectDataSourceSorting#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceSorting/CS/SortingDataExample.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[ObjectDataSourceSorting#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceSorting/VB/SortingDataExampleVB.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定以分號分隔的字串，表示用於 Microsoft SQL Server 快取相依性的資料庫和資料表。

span.span: Gets or sets a semicolon-delimited string that indicates which databases and tables to use for the Microsoft SQL Server cache dependency.

value.span: 字串，表示用於 SQL Server 快取相依性的資料庫和資料表。

span.span: A string that indicates which databases and tables to use for the SQL Server cache dependency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援選擇性的到期原則為基礎的（服務必須設定為資料庫伺服器） 的資料快取的物件。The control supports an optional expiration policy that is based on the object for the data cache (the service must be configured for the database server). SQL Server 支援兩種機制快取失效： 輪詢和通知。SQL Server supports two mechanisms for cache invalidation: polling and notification. 每個機制有不同的語法，如物件。Each mechanism has a different syntax for the object. 支援只有輪詢。The supports only polling. 字串用來建立物件傳遞給建構函式之前執行方法。The string is used to create a object that is passed to the constructor before the method is executed. 字串會識別資料庫和資料表根據相同的格式，可由`@ Page`指示詞，其中字串的第一個部分是 SQL Server 資料庫的連接字串，後面接著冒號分隔符號，以及最後的名稱資料庫資料表 (例如`"connectionstring1:table1"`)。The string identifies databases and tables according to the same format that is used by the `@ Page` directive, where the first part of the string is a connection string to a SQL Server database, followed by a colon delimiter, and finally the name of the database table (for example, `"connectionstring1:table1"`). 如果取決於多個資料表的屬性、 連接字串和表格名稱組會以分號 (比方說， `"connectionstring1:table1";connectionstring2:table2"`)。If the property depends on more than one table, the connection string and table name pairs are separated by semicolons (for example, `"connectionstring1:table1";connectionstring2:table2"`). 若要支援通知，您必須撰寫的快取邏輯的實作中您屬性，並處理建構程式碼中的物件。To support notification, you must write the cache logic in the implementation of your property and handle the construction of the object in your code. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何建立 SQL Server 快取相依性，並設定屬性物件。The first code example demonstrates how to create a SQL Server cache dependency and set the property of a object. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何實作包裝函式方法會傳回物件來啟用快取和使用篩選物件。The second code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a object to enable caching and filtering with an object. 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立 SQL Server 快取相依性，並設定屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a SQL Server cache dependency and set the property of a control. 在此範例中，資料庫是每隔 120 秒輪詢。In this example, the database is polled every 120 seconds. Northwind Traders 員工中的資料期間，資料表的變更時間，快取的任何資料控制項，並顯示控制項已過期，並在下一個頁面要求上擷取一組新的資料。If the data in the Northwind Traders Employees table changes during that time, any data that is cached by the control and displayed by the control is expired and a new set of data is retrieved on the next request for the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_7#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_7/CS/objds7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_7#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_7/VB/objds7vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作包裝函式方法會傳回物件來啟用快取和使用篩選控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a object to enable caching and filtering with an control. 中的基底實作`EmployeeLogic`類別，`GetAllEmployees`方法會傳回物件。In the base implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` class, the `GetAllEmployees` method returns an object. 而不是重構完全要使用的物件名在 Web Form 頁面上，為包裝函式方法`GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet`加入傳回一組`NorthwindEmployee`做為資料。Instead of refactoring the object completely to work with the on a Web Forms page, a wrapper method named `GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet` is added that returns a set of `NorthwindEmployee` data as a . [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5/CS/northwindemployee5.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5/VB/northwindemployee5.vb#2)]

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data retrieval method parameter that is used to indicate the value of the identifier of the first record to retrieve for data source paging support.

value.span: 用於指出要擷取之第一個資料錄的商務物件方法參數名稱。

span.span: The name of the business object method parameter used to indicate the first record to retrieve.

value.span: 參數必須傳回整數值。

span.span: The parameter must return an integer value.

value.span: 預設值是"startRowIndex"。

span.span: The default is "startRowIndex".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來支援資料來源分頁。The property is used to support data source paging. 如需如何也支援傳呼控制項，請參閱。For information about how paging is supported by the control, see . 屬性會將委派給屬性相關聯的物件控制項。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. ## Examples 下列三個範例顯示網頁，程式碼後置頁面類別，讓使用者挑選的多少筆記錄會顯示在頁面中的資料存取類別。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable the user to pick how many records are displayed in the page. 包含網頁控制項屬性設定為`true`。The Web page contains an control whose property is set to `true`. 屬性設定為在查詢中傳回的記錄總數的方法名稱。The property is set to the name of a method that returns the total number of records in the query. 屬性和屬性都設為用於 Select 方法參數的名稱。The property and the property are set to the names of the parameters that are used in the Select method. 這個頁面也包含控制項。The page also contains a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx#1)] 第二個範例顯示的處理常式事件的控制項。The second example shows a handler for the event of the control. 處理常式集合中的程式碼使用者選取的屬性。The code in the handler sets the property to the user's selection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx.vb#2)] 第三個範例會顯示 Customers 資料表中擷取資料的資料存取類別。The third example shows the data access class that retrieves data from the Customers table. 它包含一個名為方法`GetSubsetOfEmployees`，為指派給屬性控制項。It includes a method named `GetSubsetOfEmployees`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 此範例也包含一個名為方法`GetEmployeeCount`，為指派給屬性控制項。The example also includes a method named `GetEmployeeCount`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 類別會使用 LINQ 來查詢 [客戶] 資料表。The class uses LINQ to query the Customers table. 這個範例需要 LINQ to SQL 類別代表 Customers 資料表與 Northwind 資料庫。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Customers table. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建立的 LINQ to SQL 類別，在 Web 專案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立物件的執行個體控制項繫結至、 控制項使用反映來載入執行階段的型別名稱識別的型別。To create an instance of the object that the control binds to, the control uses reflection to load the type that is identified by the type name at run time. 因此，windows 7屬性可以是位於 Bin 或 App_Code 目錄中的程式碼的不完整的類型 」 或 「 已註冊在全域組件快取中的程式碼的完整型別名稱。Therefore, the value of the property can be a partially qualified type for code that is located in the Bin or App_Code directories or a fully qualified type name for code that is registered in the global assembly cache. 如果您使用全域組件快取時，您必須新增到適當的參考`assemblies`Machine.config 或 Web.config 檔案區段。If you use the global assembly cache, you must add the appropriate reference to the `assemblies` section of the Machine.config or Web.config file. 類型必須有預設建構函式，除非您處理自行建立它的執行個體的事件。The type must have a default constructor, unless you handle the event to create an instance of it yourself. 每次呼叫建立型別的執行個體， ， ，和方法，如果型別上的方法是成員方法。An instance of the type is created for each call to the , , , and methods, if the methods on the type are member methods. 如果方法是，不會建立執行個體`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中)。An instance is not created if the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 如果類型實作介面，方法會終結物件之前呼叫。If the type implements the interface, the method is called before the object is destroyed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何控制項可以顯示資料，使用Web Form 網頁上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how a control can display data by using an control on a Web Forms page. 識別的部分或完整類別名稱及其屬性和方法，呼叫以擷取資料以其屬性。The identifies a partially or fully qualified class name with its property and a method that is called to retrieve data with its property. 在執行階段，建立物件，並使用反映來呼叫此方法。At run time, the object is created and the method is called using reflection. 控制列舉所傳回的集合屬性，並顯示資料。The control enumerates through the collection that is returned by the property, and displays the data. summary.span: 藉由呼叫由 屬性所識別的方法，同時使用 集合中的任何參數，執行更新作業。

span.span: Performs an update operation by calling the method that is identified by the property and any parameters that are in the collection.

returns.span: 表示基礎資料儲存中更新之資料列數目的值。

span.span: A value that represents the number of rows updated in the underlying data storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 商務物件會假設為一次，而不是批次中更新資料的一筆記錄。The business object is assumed to update data one record at a time, rather than in a batch. 再執行作業時，方法呼叫來引發事件。Before the operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理事件來檢查參數的值，以及任何先執行前置處理作業。You can handle the event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before an operation. 若要執行更新作業，物件會使用反映來建立物件所識別的執行個體屬性。To perform an update operation, the object uses reflection to create an instance of the object that is identified by the property. 接著，它呼叫的方法，由會使用所有相關聯的屬性屬性。It then calls the method that is identified by the property, using any associated properties. 在後作業完成時，方法呼叫來引發事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理來檢查任何傳回值、 輸出參數，以及例外狀況，並執行任何後續處理的事件。You can handle the event to examine any return values, output parameters, and exceptions, and to perform any post-processing. 方法會委派給方法相關聯控制項。The method delegates to the method of the that is associated with the control. 如需有關參數合併、 物件存留期，以及方法解析的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 您應該驗證您從用戶端接收任何參數值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 執行階段只需用到參數值來取代屬性。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. ## 資料繫結控制項Data-Bound Controls 當控制項控制項相關聯資料繫結，例如控制項，不需要呼叫從網頁程式碼的方法。When the control is associated with a data-bound control, such as the control, it is not necessary to call the method from page code. 方法是直接由叫用資料繫結控制項改。The method is invoked directly by the data-bound control instead. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用控制控制項，以及數個物件來更新資料。The first code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several objects to update data. 第二個程式碼範例示範`EmployeeLogic`第一個程式碼範例中使用的類別。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制控制項，以及數個控制項更新資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several controls to update data. 會顯示為 Northwind 員工名稱而控制項可用來輸入及更新的地址資訊。The displays the name of a Northwind employee, while the controls are used to enter and update address information. 因為集合包含繫結至所選值的物件，會引發按鈕選取某個員工時，才會啟用作業。Because the collection contains a object that is bound to the selected value of the , the button that raises the operation is enabled only after an employee is selected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/CS/objds12cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/VB/objds12vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範`EmployeeLogic`上述的程式碼範例中使用的類別。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/CS/northwindemployee12.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/VB/northwindemployee12.vb#2)]

summary.span: 發生於 作業已經完成時。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件，來檢查傳回的值或輸出參數的值，或判斷是否發生例外狀況在之後作業已完成。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value or output parameters, or to determine whether an exception was thrown after an operation has completed. 傳回值、 輸出參數和例外狀況處理屬性都是從與事件相關聯的物件。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

member this.UpdateMethod : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項叫用以更新資料之方法或函式的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the control invokes to update data.

value.span: 字串，表示 用於更新資料之方法或函式的名稱。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the uses to update data.

value.span: 預設為空字串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制假設所識別的方法屬性會執行更新一次，而不是批次中。The control assumes that the method that is identified by the property performs updates one at a time, rather than in a batch. 屬性會將委派給屬性相關聯的物件控制項。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. 請確定參數名稱設定為控制在集合符合 select 方法所傳回的資料行名稱。Make sure that the parameter names configured for the control in the collection match the column names that are returned by the select method. ## 物件存留期Object Lifetime 所識別的方法屬性可以是執行個體方法或`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中) 方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果是執行個體方法，商務物件會建立和終結方法所指定的每次稱為屬性。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method that is specified by the property is called. 您可以處理並事件，以使用之前的方法所指定的商務物件屬性稱為。You can handle the and events to work with the business object before the method that is specified by the property is called. 您也可以處理所指定的方法後，引發的事件稱為屬性。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method that is specified by the property is called. 如果商務物件會實作介面，方法會終結物件之前呼叫。If the business object implements the interface, the method is called before the object is destroyed. 如果方法`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中)，不會建立商務物件，而且您無法處理， ，和事件。If the method is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the business object is never created and you cannot handle the , , and events. ## 合併的參數Parameter Merging 參數會加入至三個來源的集合：Parameters are added to the collection from three sources: - 從資料繫結控制項，在執行階段。From the data-bound control, at run time. - 從`UpdateParameters`項目，以宣告方式。From the `UpdateParameters` element, declaratively. - 從事件處理常式，以程式設計的方式。From the event handler, programmatically. 首先，將資料繫結控制項所產生的任何參數新增至集合。First, any parameters that are generated from data-bound controls are added to the collection. 比方說，如果控制項所繫結具有資料行的控制項`Name`並`Number`，參數`Name`和`Number`加入至集合。For example, if the control is bound to a control that has the columns `Name` and `Number`, the parameters for `Name` and `Number` are added to the collection. 參數的完整名稱取決於屬性。The exact name of the parameter depends on the property. 這些參數的資料類型是`string`。The data type of these parameters is `string`. 下一步，參數中所列`UpdateParameters`新增項目。Next, the parameters that are listed in the `UpdateParameters` element are added. 如果中的參數`UpdateParameters`在找到具有相同名稱做為已在為參數的項目集合中，現有的參數會修改成符合參數中指定`UpdateParameters`項目。If a parameter in the `UpdateParameters` element is found with the same name as a parameter that is already in the collection, the existing parameter is modified to match the parameter that is specified in the `UpdateParameters` element. 一般而言，這用來修改參數中的資料型別。Typically, this is used to modify the type of the data in the parameter. 最後，您可以透過程式設計方式加入和移除參數之前，就會發生的事件方法執行。Finally, you can programmatically add and remove parameters in the event, which occurs before the method is run. 參數會合併之後，就會解決方法。The method is resolved after the parameters are merged. 方法解析會在下一節中討論。Method resolution is discussed in the next section. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您應該驗證您從用戶端接收任何參數值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 執行階段只需用到參數值來取代屬性。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. ## 方法解析Method Resolution 當呼叫方法時，資料欄位從資料繫結控制項所建立宣告式的參數`UpdateParameters`項目，以及已加入的參數所有合併事件處理常式。When the method is called, the data fields from the data-bound control, the parameters that were created declaratively in the `UpdateParameters` element, and the parameters that were added in the event handler are all merged. （如需詳細資訊，請參閱上一節）。控制然後嘗試尋找要呼叫的方法。(For more information, see the preceding section.) The control then attempts to find a method to call. 首先，它會尋找名稱中指定的一或多個方法屬性。First, it looks for one or more methods with the name that is specified in the property. 如果找到相符項目，則擲回例外狀況。If no match is found, an exception is thrown. 如果找到相符項目，則會尋找相符的參數名稱。If a match is found, it then looks for matching parameter names. 例如，假設所指定的型別屬性有兩個方法，名為`UpdateARecord`。For example, suppose a type that is specified by the property has two methods named `UpdateARecord`. 一`UpdateARecord`有一個參數， `ID`，和其他`UpdateARecord`有兩個參數，`Name`和`Number`。One `UpdateARecord` has one parameter, `ID`, and the other `UpdateARecord` has two parameters, `Name` and `Number`. 如果集合中有一個名為的參數`ID`，則`UpdateARecord`方法只`ID`參數稱為。If the collection has only one parameter named `ID`, the `UpdateARecord` method with just the `ID` parameter is called. 參數的型別不會檢查在解析方法。The type of the parameter is not checked in resolving the methods. 參數的順序並不重要。The order of the parameters does not matter. 如果屬性設定，方法解決了不同的方式。If the property is set, the method is resolved in a different way. 中所指定名稱的方法會尋找中指定屬性，會採用一個參數的型別，屬性。The looks for a method with the name that is specified in the property that takes one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 在此情況下，參數名稱不重要。In this case, the name of the parameter does not matter. ## Examples 下列三個範例顯示網頁 」、 「 程式碼後置頁面類別和 「 資料存取類別，可讓使用者以擷取和更新 Northwind 資料庫中的 [員工] 資料表中的記錄。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable a user to retrieve and update records in the Employees table in the Northwind database. 第一個範例顯示包含兩個網頁控制項控制項，和控制項。The first example shows a Web page that contains two controls, a control, and a control. 第一個控制項和控制項用以擷取並顯示資料庫中的員工名稱。The first control and the control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database. 第二個控制項和控制項用來擷取、 顯示和修改從 選取使用者的員工記錄的資料。The second control and the control are used to retrieve, display, and modify the data from the employee record that is selected by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 第二個範例示範處理常式和事件。The second example shows handlers for the and events. 事件處理常式序列化的物件，包含從 Employee 資料表中擷取的資料。The event handler serializes the object that contains data that was retrieved from the Employee table. 序列化的物件會儲存在檢視狀態。The serialized object is stored in view state. 事件處理常式會將還原序列化的物件，包含正在更新的資料記錄的原始資料的檢視狀態中。The event handler deserializes the object in view state that contains the original data for the data record that is being updated. 物件，其中包含原始資料做為參數傳遞至 Update 方法。The object that contains the original data is passed as a parameter to the Update method. 原始資料必須傳遞至資料庫，以便它可以用來檢查資料是否已修改另一個處理序。The original data must be passed to the database so that it can be used to check whether the data has been modified by another process. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx.vb#2)] 第三個範例會顯示與 Northwind 資料庫互動的資料存取類別。The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database. 類別會使用 LINQ 來查詢和更新的 Employees 資料表。The class uses LINQ to query and update the Employees table. 這個範例需要 LINQ to SQL 類別代表 Northwind 資料庫與 Employees 資料表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Employees table. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建立的 LINQ to SQL 類別，在 Web 專案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UpdateParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得參數集合，包含 屬性指定之方法所使用的參數。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the method that is specified by the property.

value.span: ，包含由 屬性指定之方法所使用的參數。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the method that is specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名稱和參數中所包含的類型集合的名稱和參數的類型，必須符合方法簽章。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters in the method signature. 參數名稱會受到屬性且區分大小寫。The parameter names are affected by the property and are case-sensitive. 集合中的參數取決於資料繫結控制項以宣告方式指定的參數，以程式設計方式加入的參數中的資料。The parameters in the collection depend on the data in the data-bound control, the parameters that are specified declaratively, and the parameters that are added programmatically. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 合併參數 」 一節並[使用的參數，與 ObjectDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information, see the "Parameter Merging" section in and [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). 屬性會擷取屬性所含相關聯的物件控制項。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. 如需有關參數合併、 物件存留期，以及方法解析的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 您應該驗證您從用戶端接收任何參數值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 執行階段只需用到參數值來取代屬性。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用控制控制項，以及數個物件來更新資料。The first code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several objects to update data. 第二個程式碼範例示範`EmployeeLogic`第一個程式碼範例中使用的類別。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制控制項，以及數個控制項更新資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several controls to update data. 會顯示為 Northwind 員工名稱而控制項可用來輸入及更新的地址資訊。The displays the name of a Northwind employee, while the controls are used to enter and update address information. 因為集合包含繫結至選取的值，會引發按鈕選取某個員工時，才會啟用作業。Because the collection contains a that is bound to the selected value of the , the button that raises the operation is enabled only after an employee is selected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/CS/objds12cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/VB/objds12vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範`EmployeeLogic`上述的程式碼範例中使用的類別。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件來執行特定應用程式時，用來驗證參數的值，或變更之前的參數值的其他初始化控制項執行更新作業。Handle the event to perform additional initialization that is specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the update operation. 會提供做為參數集合，即可存取屬性，它由物件。The parameters are available as an collection that is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列三個範例顯示網頁 」、 「 程式碼後置頁面類別和 「 資料存取類別，可讓使用者以擷取和更新 Northwind 資料庫中的 [員工] 資料表中的記錄。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable a user to retrieve and update records in the Employees table in the Northwind database. 第一個範例顯示包含兩個網頁控制項控制項，和控制項。The first example shows a Web page that contains two controls, a control, and a control. 第一個控制項和控制項用以擷取並顯示資料庫中的員工名稱。The first control and the control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database. 第二個控制項和控制項用來擷取、 顯示和修改從 選取使用者的員工記錄的資料。The second control and the control are used to retrieve, display, and modify the data from the employee record that is selected by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 第二個範例示範處理常式和事件。The second example shows handlers for the and events. 事件處理常式序列化的物件，包含從 Employee 資料表中擷取的資料。The event handler serializes the object that contains data that was retrieved from the Employee table. 序列化的物件會儲存在檢視狀態。The serialized object is stored in view state. 事件處理常式會將還原序列化的物件，包含正在更新的資料記錄的原始資料的檢視狀態中。The event handler deserializes the object in view state that contains the original data for the data record that is being updated. 物件，其中包含原始資料做為參數傳遞至 Update 方法。The object that contains the original data is passed as a parameter to the Update method. 原始資料必須傳遞至資料庫，以便它可以用來檢查資料是否已修改另一個處理序。The original data must be passed to the database so that it can be used to check whether the data has been modified by another process. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx.vb#2)] 第三個範例會顯示與 Northwind 資料庫互動的資料存取類別。The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database. 類別會使用 LINQ 來查詢和更新的 Employees 資料表。The class uses LINQ to query and update the Employees table. 這個範例需要 LINQ to SQL 類別代表 Northwind 資料庫與 Employees 資料表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Employees table. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建立的 LINQ to SQL 類別，在 Web 專案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081).
